Run one sheet of rice paper quickly under tepid water, handling carefully because paper is very brittle. Place sheet on work surface and brush quickly with egg. Let stand a few seconds, until flexible. With very sharp knife, cut into quarters(or halves, if larger rolls are desired). Place one tablespoon filling on round edge of quarter piece; roll over once, then tuck in sides to enclose filling and continue rolling. If using halves, place about 1/3 cup filling on one end, roll once, tuck in sides and roll up. Continue filling and rolling until all filling is used. The egg will hold the rolls together. In wok or 10-inch frying pan, heat oil until a drop of water jumps on the surface. Fry about eight rolls at a time until golden brown, about 15 minutes. Drain on paper towels, garnish with scallions and serve with lettuce leaves and Nuoc Cham. Makes about 50 small or 30 large egg rolls. Dipping Sauce (Nuoc cham) If using fresh chili, remove seeds and membrane. In food processor or blender, combine chili, garlic, sugar, lime, fish sauce and water. Process or blend until well minced. Pour into serving dish and sprinkle with carrot and scallion. Makes about 3/4 cup

recipe.name: Kazakh Plov
recipe.description: This is a traditional Kazakh food. This recipe contains my mother's own way of cooking this tasty dish.
recipe.ingredients: 600 gr. of lamb, 3 dining spoons of melted fat, 3 onions, 4 large carrots, 1 glass of rice, 1/4 glass of raisins
recipe.directions: Cut onions into rings and put it into heated pot and fry till onions become golden-coloured. Put medium sliced pieces of lamb into the pot and fry with onions till meat becomes ruddy. Cut carrots into straws, add to pot with pepper and salt. Fry till half done. Wash rice and put it into the pot and add water with ratio - 1.5 glass of water for 1 glass of rice. Wait till the pot starts boiling. Spread raisins inside the pot and stew on slow fire for 1 hour not mixing the mass. Turn off the fire and let plov rest for 10-15 minutes. Then mix the mass and serve the dish.

recipe.name: Oven Fried Chicken With Honey Butter Sauce
recipe.description: This is one of my mother's specialty. Chicken with honey and butter is the best combination.
recipe.ingredients: 1/2 cup melted butter, 1 cup all-purpose flour, 2 teaspoons paprika, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon pepper, 1 chicken (cut up), 1/4 cup melted butter, 1/4 cup lemon juice, 1/2 cup honey
recipe.directions: Pour 1/2 c melted butter in a baking dish. Combine flour, paprika, salt and pepper. Dredge chicken pieces in the flour mixture. Put chicken pieces in the baking dish and turn to coat with butter. Cover and bake, meaty side down, at 400 degrees for 30 minutes. Combine 1/4 c melted butter, lemon juice and honey. After the chicken pieces have cooked for 30 minutes, turn the pieces over. Pour the sauce over the chicken. Bake uncovered for an additional 25-30 minutes or until chicken is done. 4-6 servings.

recipe.name: Omurice (Japanese Omelet Rice)
recipe.description: Omurice is a very popular dish in Japan.
recipe.ingredients: 4 cups steamed Japanese rice 1/2 lb. chicken breast 1 green peppers, chopped 4 white mushrooms, sliced 1/2 onion, chopped salt and pepper to season 4 Tbsp. ketchup vegetable oil for frying 8 eggs
recipe.directions: Cook steamed rice. Cut chicken into small pieces. Chop green pepper and onion. Slice mushrooms thinly. Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet and saute chicken. Add onion, mushrooms, and green pepper in the skillet and saute together until softened. Add steamed rice in the pan and stir-fry together. Sprinkle some salt and pepper. Stop the heat and add ketchup and mix well. Set the seasoned rice aside. Heat 1 tsp of vegetable oil in a large skillet. Beat two eggs in a small bowl and pour the egg in the skillet. Quickly spread the egg and make a round omelet. Place 1/4 of the seasoned rice in the middle of the omelet and fold top and bottom sides of omelet over the rice. Cover the frying pan with a plate and turn them over to place the omerice in the plate. Repeat this process to make four omelet rice. Put some ketchup on top of omurice just before serving.

recipe.name: Cake
recipe.description: The cake is a lie. If you don't get the joke then you should play the game What did you expect from someone in the game development stream?
recipe.ingredients: 1 18.25 ounce package chocolate cake mix 1 can prepared coconut pecan frosting 3/4 cup vegetable oil 4 large eggs 1 cup semi-sweet chocolate chips 3/4 cups butter or margarine 1 2/3 cups granulated sugar Two cups all purpose flower Garnishes such as: Fish shaped crackers Fish shaped candies Fish shaped solid waste Fish shaped dirt Fish shaped ethyl benzene Pull and peel licorice Fish shaped organic compounds Sediment shaped sediment Candy coated peanut butter pieces shaped like fish 1 cup lemon juice Alpha resins Unsaturated polyester resin Fiberglass surface resins Volatile malted milk impoundments 9 large egg yolks 12 medium geosynthetic membranes 1 cup granulated sugar 2 cups rhubard, sliced 2/3 cups granulated rhubarb 1 tablespoon all-purpose rhubarb 1 teaspoon grated orange rhubarb 3 tablespoons rhubarb, on fire 1 cross borehole electro-magnetic imaging rhubarb 2 tablespoons rhubarb juice Cordless electric needle injector Injector needle driver Injector needle gun Cranial caps
recipe.directions: Mix it; Cook it; Garnish it; Let sit for 2-3 hours in a cool dry environment; Eat with mouth

recipe.name: Chilli Chicken
recipe.description: This is a Spicy Sri Lankan side dish, and can be used to eat it with rice or noodles.
recipe.ingredients: 500-600gms. boneless chicken (cut into1-inch cubes) 2 tbsp Soy sauce 1 egg 2 tbsp corn flour / corn starch 5-6 green chilies (finely chopped) 1 tsp garlic paste Salt To Taste 1/2 tsp white pepper powder to taste 1 tsp sugar A pinch of ajinomoto (optional) 2 cups chicken stock / water 1 tbsp cooking oil Oil to fry spring onions for garnishing
recipe.directions: Take 1tbsp Soy sauce, 1tbsp corn flour, salt, egg in a bowl and marinate chicken pieces in the the mixture for about 10-15 minutes. Heat oil and deep fry the marinated chicken pieces till golden brown. Now in a separate wok heat 1 tbsp oil and add garlic paste and green chilies and saut? for few seconds. Add 2 cups of chicken broth or water. Bring to boil and add sugar, pepper powder, salt , ajinomoto and remaining Soya sauce. Add fried chicken pieces to it and cook for few minutes. Dissolve the remaining corn flour in 1/2 cup water and add to the curry stirring constantly to avoid lumps. Cook for 2-3 minutes. Serve chilli chicken hot garnished with chopped spring onions. Goes well with Naan, Chappathi, Roti and fried rice.

recipe.name: Banana Chocolate Chip Muffin
recipe.description: Banana flavoured muffins with chocolate chips. Self explanatory!
recipe.ingredients:
Dry Ingredients:
2 cups flour 1/4 cup white sugar 2 teaspoons baking powder 1 teaspoon baking soda 1 pinch of salt 1 cup chocolate chips
Wet Ingredients:
2 cups mashed bananas (3 or 4) 1/2 cup melted butter 1/4 cup milk 2 eggs
recipe.directions: In large bowl, mix all dry ingredients. Add chocolate chips last. In small bowl, blend all wet ingredients together. Then add your banana mixture to your flour mixture and stir just until the 2 mixtures are blended. Don't overmix. Grease muffin cups with small amount of oil on paper towel to prevent sticking. Fill cups 3/4 full. Bake at 350 degrees for approx. 25 minutes or until muffins bounce back when touched on top. Enjoy!

recipe.name: Best-ever brownies
recipe.description: Yummy brownies
recipe.ingredients: 1 cup(250 mL) whole hazelnuts, skin-on or blanched whole almonds (optional) 1 cup(250 mL) all-purpose flour1/4 cup(50 mL) cocoa powder 1/4 tsp(1 mL) salt6 oz(168 g) semi-sweet chocolate, about 6 squares 1/2 cup(125 mL) unsalted butter 3 eggs 1 cup(250 mL) granulated sugar 2 tsp(10 mL) vanilla

recipe.name: Gingerbread Cookies
recipe.description: A very tasty gingerbread recipe great for making holiday cookies.
recipe.ingredients: 6 cups all-purpose flour 1 tablespoon baking powder 1 tablespoon ground ginger 1 teaspoon ground nutmeg 1 teaspoon ground cloves 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon 1 cup shortening, melted and cooled slightly 1 cup molasses 1 cup packed brown sugar 1/2 cup water 1 egg 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
recipe.directions:
1. Sift together the flour, baking powder, ginger, nutmeg, cloves, and cinnamon; set aside.
2. In a medium bowl, mix together the shortening, molasses, brown sugar, water, egg, and vanilla until smooth. Gradually stir in the dry ingredients, until they are completely absorbed. Divide dough into 3 pieces, pat down to 1 1/2 inch thickness, wrap in plastic wrap, and refrigerate for at least 3 hours.
3. Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). On a lightly floured surface, roll the dough out to 1/4 inch thickness. Cut into desired shapes with cookie cutters. Place cookies 1 inch apart onto an ungreased cookie sheet.
4. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven. When the cookies are done, they will look dry, but still be soft to the touch. Remove from the baking sheet to cool on wire racks. When cool, the cookies can be frosted with the icing of your choice.

recipe.name: Chicken Fettuccini Alfredo
recipe.description: Meal to be prepared is Chicken Fettucci Alfredo.It is a creamy cheesy Alfredo dish." Preparation time:30mimutes." Cook Time : 30 minutes." Ready in: 1hour."
recipe.ingredients: 6 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into cubes" 6 tablespoons butter, divided " 4 cloves garlic, minced, divided" 1 tablespoon Italian seasoning" 1 pound fettuccini pasta" 1 onion, diced " 1 (8 ounce) package sliced mushrooms" 1/3 cup all-purpose flour" 1 tablespoon salt " 3/4 teaspoon ground white pepper" 3 cups milk " 1 cup half-and-half " 3/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese " 8 ounces shredded Colby-Monterey Jack cheese" 3 roma (plum) tomatoes, diced " 1/2 cup sour cream " "1)In a large skillet over medium heat combine chicken, 2 tablespoons butter, garlic and Italian seasoning. Cook until chicken is no longer pink inside. Remove from skillet and set aside. 2)Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain. 3)Meanwhile, melt 4 tablespoons butter in the skillet. Saute onion, 2 tablespoons garlic and mushrooms until onions are transparent. Stir in flour, salt and pepper; cook 2 minutes. Slowly add milk and half-and-half, stirring until smooth and creamy. Stir in Parmesan and Colby-Monterey Jack cheeses; stir until cheese is melted. Stir in chicken mixture, tomatoes and sour cream. After which fettuccini is ready to be served!!." );
recipe.directions: null

recipe.name: Hot 'n' Spicy Buffalo Chicken Salad
recipe.description: If you like Buffalo Chicken Wings, you'll love this take on it.
recipe.ingredients: 1/3 cup butter, melted 1/3 cup Louisiana-style hot sauce 3 large skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into 1 inch cubes salt and pepper 1 tablespoon vegetable oil 2 heads romaine lettuce, chopped 1/3 cup blue cheese dressing 1/4 cup crumbled blue cheese 1 tablespoon salad seasoning mix
recipe.directions: Whisk together the melted butter, hot sauce, and salad seasoning in a small bowl. Set aside. Season cubed chicken with salt and pepper. Heat a large skillet over high heat, and pour in the vegetable oil. Just before the oil starts to smoke, add the chicken. Cook to brown evenly, about 3 minutes. Reduce heat to low, and pour in the reserved sauce. Simmer until chicken is cooked through and no longer pink, about 5 minutes. Toss together the lettuce, blue cheese dressing, and blue cheese in a large bowl. Top salad with chicken, and serve. Make 4 servings.

recipe.name: Bacalhau (Cod Fish)
recipe.description: Traditional portuguese recipe. The word bacalhau in portuguese means cod, this main dish is traditionaly found friday nights in portuguese's homes.
recipe.ingredients: 1 lb. of salt cod ( most times found in little wooden boxes) 5 to 6 large potatoes 2 large onions, sliced 1 green peppers, sliced into slivers 3 hard-boiled eggs, sliced 4 cloves of garlic black olives, those sliced ones are real good black pepper to taste 2 tablespoons of parsley, chopped fine if fresh 1 tablespoon of vinegar or the juice of one lemon
recipe.directions: 1 lb. of salt cod ( most times found in little wooden boxes) 5 to 6 large potatoes 2 large onions, sliced 1 green peppers, sliced into slivers 3 hard-boiled eggs, sliced 4 cloves of garlic black olives, those sliced ones are real good black pepper to taste 2 tablespoons of parsley, chopped fine if fresh 1 tablespoon of vinegar or the juice of one lemon Just a side note here that you might want to add either a 1/2 cup of red or white wine. Soak cod fish overnight. Boil the cod fish the next day in unsalted water for 15 min. Flake fish and set aside. Boil potatoes, slice and set aside. Slice onion, peppers, crush garlic and saut? in olive oil. In large casserole add a layer as follows, potatoes, then fish, sliced hard-eggs, onion, peppers, garlic. Sprinkle olives and parsley. Pour olive oil over the entire casserole. Cover and bake at 350 degrees for a 1/2 hour in a 3 qt. casserole dish.

recipe.name: Banana Caramel Toast
recipe.description: the sweet breakfast that goes well with coffee. It gives you the energy to start up the day.
recipe.ingredients: 1 sliced bread 1 banana 5g butter 1+2/3tbs sugar 1tbs water cinnamon
recipe.directions: 1. slice the banana, lightly toast the bread 2. put sugar and water into the pan, stir then put on medium heat until it gets thickened and until the color changes to caramel 3.put banana and butter into the pan, put on the toast and shake some cinnamon on top

recipe.name: Mini Crab Bites
recipe.description: The crab mix itself is delicious, just crab meat with bits of corn and onion, then presented in tiny portions in 'spoons' of slightly bitter endive leaves.
recipe.ingredients: 1/2 cup corn 1/4 cup finely chopped red onion 1/4 cup mayonnaise 1 tablespoon frozen orange juice concentrate 1 teaspoon lemon zest 1 tablespoon lemon juice 1/2 teaspoon ground cumin 1/8 teaspoon cayenne pepper 4 teaspoons fresh tarragon, chopped Salt & pepper to taste 8 ounces fresh or canned crab
recipe.directions: Mix all crab mix ingredients except the crab. Taste and adjust seasoning. Stir in the crab. (Stop here if making in advance, as much as 24 hours before serving.) Place a small spoonful of crab in the 'bowl' of each endive leaf. Arrange on platter and serve immediately.

recipe.name: Sambar
recipe.description: A tamil food called 'Sambar' in native language Tamil. It is great to have with rice. Be careful, it is spicy.
recipe.ingredients: 4-5 strips tamarind soaked for 5 minutes (paste or pulp may also be used), 1 tbsp. jaggery or sugar, 2 tbsp. sambar masala, 1/4 tsp. turmeric powder, 1 tsp. dhania powder, 1 tsp. red chilli powder, 1/2 tsp. each cumin and mustard seeds, 3 whole red chillies, 1 stalk curry leaves, 4 onions, 1/2 cup pumpkin or bottle gourd boiled and cubed, 1 large tomato, 1 tbsp. chopped coriander leaves, 2-3 brinjals, 1 drumstick, 100gms of chopped mixed vegetables, potato, peas, cauliflower, carrot, 2-3 flakes garlic, salt to taste, 2 tbsp. oil

recipe.name: Lemon Herb Chicken
recipe.description: This is a simple, quick and delicious dish. All you need are a few spices and, of course, the chicken! The amount of spices are completely up to you. You can add more or less according to your taste. Enjoy!"
recipe.ingredients: 2 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves 1 lemon salt and pepper to taste 1 tablespoon olive oil 1 pinch dried oregano 2 sprigs fresh parsley, for garnish
recipe.directions: Cut lemon in half, and squeeze juice from 1/2 lemon on chicken. Season with salt to taste. Let sit while you heat oil in a small skillet over medium low heat. When oil is hot, put chicken in skillet. As you saute chicken, add juice from other 1/2 lemon, pepper to taste, and oregano. Saute for 5 to 10 minutes each side, or until juices run clear. Serve with parsley for garnish.

recipe.name: Kung Pao Chicken
recipe.description: This is a traditional Chinese recipe. I found it from one Chinese guy's blog. It should taste spicy. You'd better eat it with rice.
recipe.ingredients: 1 lb. boned, skinned chicken breasts - cubed 3 Tbls. soy sauce - divided 1 1/2 Tbls. cornstarch mixed with 1 1/2 Tbls. cold water 1 Tbls. dry sherry 1 Tbls. granulated sugar 1 tsp. cornstarch 1/2 tsp. salt 1 tsp. sesame oil 3 1/2 Tbls. vegetable oil - divided 1/2 cup unsalted roasted peanuts 4-8 dried red chili peppers - chopped 1 slice peeled, fresh ginger - chopped 1 clove garlic - sliced
recipe.directions: Combine chicken, 1 Tbls. soy sauce, and cornstarch/water mixture; allow to marinate for 30 minutes. Combine 2 Tbls. soy sauce, sherry, sugar, cornstarch, salt, and sesame oil; set aside. In a hot wok, stir-fry the peanuts in 1 1/2 Tbls. vegetable oil until golden brown, remove peanuts from wok, and set aside. Fill wok with vegetable oil for frying and heat to 350 degrees. Carefully slide the chicken into the wok, piece by piece, and fry for 1 minute. Remove chicken from oil and drain on a brown paper bag. Remove oil from wok. In hot wok, stir-fry the red peppers in 2 Tbls. vegetable oil until they turn dark. Add ginger, garlic, and chicken to the wok and fry, stirring constantly. Stir the prepared sauce and add to the wok. Stir and cook wok contents until the sauce is thickened. Stir in peanuts and serve.

recipe.name: Sweet Victorian Shrimp
recipe.description: This is an old recipe originally found in a 1940s cookbook, modified after years of eating. Not spicey by any means, it's best combined with sauce of personal preference.
recipe.ingredients: 2 lb. med. shrimp peeled and deveined 1 small onion minced finely 6 tablespoon butter 3/4 lb. mushrooms salt and fresh ground pepper to taste 1 cup sour cream 1/4 cup cream 1 tablespoon lemon juice 3 teaspoon vanilla 1 tablespoon ground jamaican pepper 1 Tbs. flour
recipe.directions: Saut? shrimp and onions in 6 Tbs. butter until shrimp are pink. Add mushrooms and cook 5 min. Add remaining remaining butter, flour, vanilla, salt and pepper. Stir in sour cream. Serve hot over rice flavored with juice of 1 large lemon.

recipe.name: Grilled Chicken Thighs
recipe.description: Based on a Sri Lankan recipe for chicken thighs, and canalso be made with chicken breasts.
recipe.ingredients: 8 skinless, bone-in chicken thighs 1 teaspoon ground cumin 4 garlic cloves, crushed 2 tablespoons grated fresh ginger salt 2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice 1 teaspoon finely grated lemon zest 1/2 cup plain Greek yogurt 1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper 1/4 teaspoon Garam Masala Melted butter for basting
recipe.directions: With sharp knife, make several shallow slashes in each chicken thigh; transfer to a large baking dish. sprinkle the thighs with cumin, garlic, ginger and 1 teaspoon of salt. Rub the seasonings into the meat. Refrigerate for 1 hour. In a small ball combine the lemon juice and lemon zest with the yogurt, cayenne pepper and Garam masala to make a marinade. Pour the marinade over the chicken thighs and turn to coat them. Let the chicken in the marinade at room temperature for 1 hour. Light a grill. Remove the chicken from the marinade. Lightly brush the chicken with butter and transfer to the grill. Grill over moderate heat for 22 - 25 minutes, turning and brushing occasionally, until chicken is done.

recipe.name: Lao Egg Pancake
recipe.description: This is a traditional Laotian dish, a quick and easy meal to serve. Usually eaten with rice.
recipe.ingredients: 1 pancake: 2 eggs, 2 teaspoons fish sauce, 1 dice green onion, few dashes black pepper, 1 diced red pepper
recipe.directions: Crack the 2 eggs into a bowl. Add in the rest of the ingredients. Mix the ingredients thoroughly. Pour the mixed ingredients into a frying pan with heated cooking oil in it. Fry the egg pancake until both sides are slightly tinted brown.

recipe.name: Lobster Madness
recipe.description: this is a real cantonese styled lobster recipe. rich in flavor.
recipe.ingredients: tablespoon paprika 2 lobster tails (about 1 pound each) 1 teaspoon salt 2 tablespoons flour 1 clove garlic, minced 1 tablespoon salted black beans, (also called fermented black beans) pounded and soaked in 1 tablespoon water 1 tablespoon ginger, chopped fine 1 scallion, chopped fine 1/4 pound ground pork 2 tablespoons sherry 1 tablespoon light soy sauce 1 cup chicken stock 1 tablespoon cornstarch, dissolved in 2 tablespoons water 2 scallions, cut into 1-inch pieces 1 egg, beaten 2 to 4 cups oil for deep-frying and stir-frying
recipe.directions:
Cut each lobster tail in half. Wash thoroughly. Drain. Cut tails into pieces 1 1/2 inches in length, leaving shells on.
Sprinkle 1/2 teaspoon of salt and the flour on lobster.
Mix garlic with black bean mixture in a bowl. Stir well.
Heat oil for deep-frying to smoking hot. Put in lobster pieces. Deep-fry until shells are red. Drain. Remove.
Reheat 1 tablespoon of oil in wok. Stir-fry black bean mixture 30 seconds. Remove.
Reheat 2 tablespoons of oil in wok. Stir-fry ginger and scallion until there is an aroma, about 30 seconds. Add pork. Stir-fry on high heat until color changes. Add 1 tablespoon of sherry, soy sauce, black bean mixture, and stock. Bring to boil.
Add lobster to meat mixture. Add 1 tablespoon sherry. Cover. Cook 3 minutes.
Remove lid. Bring to boil. Thicken gravy with dissolved cornstarch. Season with 1/2 teaspoon salt. Add scallions. Slowly pour in beaten egg. Stir-fry about 10 seconds. Remove.

recipe.name: Eelam Chicken Sensation
recipe.description: This is a traditional Malaysia recipe. I found it from an international cooking book. It should taste spicy and a little bit sour. You can also use canned coconut milk to substitute coconut and milk.
recipe.spices: Garlic, Hot pepper, Dried red chili
recipe.ingredients: 12 x Boneless-Skinless Chicken Thighs (approximately 1.50 lbs / 675g) 2 Ginger 2 Bell pepper 2 tbsp Flour (Approximately) 1 1/2 cups Basmati Rice 3 cups Water 2 tbsp Cornstarch 2/3 cups Brown Sugar 1/4 cup Soy Sauce
recipe.directions: Take out equipment and ingredients. Pre-heat oven to 400 degree F.Unroll chicken thighs and place in a large cake or lasagna pan. You may need to squish them together. Brush all the thighs with water and sprinkle all the thighs evenly with flour. Place in preheated oven for 30 minutes. Meanwhile: Combine rice and water together in a microwave-safe pot with lid. Set aside until timer rings for chicken. Combine the following in a bowl in this order; cornstarch, sugar, gradually whisk in soy sauce, and water. Add ginger,pepper and red chili. When timer rings for chicken pour all over lifting the thighs to completely coat.Reset timer for another 20 minutes. Microwave rice on high for 10 minutes, then on medium an additional 10 minutes. Let stand. Sliver peppers in a colander. Toss and place in a serving bowl. When timer rings, it's ready to go. This sauce is yummy on rice and there is lots of it. Make 4 servings.

recipe.name: THE COLONATOR
recipe.description: I was bored and wanted to make a mess of the kitchen, my colon, and the toilet. The base idea was taken off the back of a chili mix packet bought at Wal-market. Trail and error has built it into the chili it is today. This dish serves three. It's suggested that this dish consumed with a side of bread. The great thing about this recipe is that everything used to make this dish can be purchased in the form of a preservable.
recipe.spices: Cayenne Pepper, powdered Chili Powder Mix, Bulk Barn Banna Pepper Chucks, Bicks Banna Pepper Chucks Brine, Bicks Paprika, powdered
recipe.ingredients: 1/2 tablespoon of basil 1 teaspoon of cayenne pepper 1 teaspoon of paprika powder 1 tablespoon of chili powder mix 1 cup of banana pepper chucks, bicks 1/4 cup of banana pepper chucks brine, bicks 1/2 cup of diced mushrooms 1 cup of diced onion 1 cup of diced tomatoes 1 cup of cheese, marble 2 cups of mixed beans 3 cups of tomato pasta 1 can of Mixed Beans 12 chicken nuggets
recipe.directions:
This recipe requires you to have a large high brimmed sauce pan. Attempting this recipe with anything else runs the risk of over flowing or improper results. It?s also suggested you make use of an oil splatter guard. There?s no risk of oil splatter, this device just prevents against sauce splatter making clean up easier.
1) In a toast oven or oven, undercook chicken nuggets by 20%. The nuggets should be cooked but not hard. They?ll appear soft or mushy. If the nuggets ready anytime before their needed, remove them and dice them into quarters.
2) While you're waiting for the chicken nuggets to heat up base a sauce pan with a 1/8 a cup of oil and let the oil melt with the stove at 50% of its maximum heat. Prepare the mixed beans, diced onions, diced tomatoes, diced mushrooms, and diced banana pepper chunks. Turn the stove to 60% and add the previously prepared ingredients. 3) Ready your tomato pasta, spices, and banana pepper brink. Give the original ingredients 6 or 7 minutes to cook. Dump the tomato pasta on first. Follow the pasta with the spices and top it off with the brine. Stir ingredients so that the pasta sauce darkens and then cover it with the splatter guard.
4) By now the chicken nuggets should be ready. Prepare then and the cup of cheese. The cheese should be added in smaller portions so that it?s easier to melt. Give the imprudence from the third stage 3 minutes at the most before adding these ingredients.
5) Increase the temperature to 80% for 9 to 10 minutes and stir every 1 to 2 minutes. If you find build up appearing on sauce pans surface, mix that back in. Draw the thicker chucks to the center and let the softer bits or liquids cook around the edge. This recipe serves three. As mentioned about, it?s suggested you give this meal a side of bread

recipe.name: Microwave Caramel Popcorn
recipe.description: This recipe yields 4 quarts of caramel popcorn. Along with the ingredients all you need is a microwave oven to complete this recipe. Meant for a quick and delicious snack.
recipe.ingredients: 1/4 cup corn syrup 1/4 cup butter 1/2 cup brown sugar 1/4 teaspoon baking soda 4 quarts popcorn (16 cups)
recipe.directions: In a small glass bowl, add the corn syrup, margarine, and brown sugar. Cook on High for 3 minutes. Stir. Add the baking soda to mixture and stir until smooth. Cook for another 30 seconds on High. Stir. Put the popcorn in a large bowl. Pour over popcorn with the hot mixture and mix until well coated.

recipe.name: SnowBoarder Pork Tenderloin
recipe.description: This recipe is a favorite in the family and among friends that have come over and were blessed by its flavour.For cooking on barbeque, heat to approximately 400F, and cook for 20 minutes, turning after 10.
recipe.ingredients: 2-? pounds pork tenderloin (2 tenderloins) ? cup Dijon-style mustard 1 tablespoon pressed garlic (4 large or 6 small cloves) ? cup best-quality dry red wine ? cup extra-virgin olive oil 1 tablespoon dried thyme, crushed ? bay leaf ? teaspoon freshly ground pepper ? teaspoon granulated sugar
recipe.directions:
Trim fat and ?silver skin? from tenderloins. Rinse, pat dry, and set aside. Place all the other ingredients in a glass pan and whisk together well. Place tenderloins in the pan, and turn them to cover with the marinade, cover the pan with plastic wrap, and place in the refrigerator for 6 hours, or overnight.
Thirty minutes before you plan to roast the pork, remove the tenderloins from the refrigerator to come to room temperature.
Preheat the oven to 400oF. Use a roasting pan with a rack; line the bottom of the pan with foil and place the tenderloins on the rack. Roast the tenderloins until an instant read thermometer inserted in the center registers 140oF ? about 20 to 25 minutes. Do not overcook the pork; the center should still be pink when served. Remove from the oven and slice.

recipe.name: Moroccan stew
recipe.description: This is a traditional Vegeterian Moroccan recipe. I learned it from my mother.
recipe.ingredients: 1 onion, chopped 1 garlic cloves, finely chopped 1 teaspoon cumin 2 cinnamon stick 1 teaspoon pepper 3 tablespoons olive oil 1 teaspoon salt 1 whole squash, cut cubes 2 whole potatoes cut into cubes 250g og garbanzo beans 2 tomatoes 1/4 glass of lemon juice 1 glass of chicken broth 1 3/4 glass of water
recipe.directions: Heat olive oil in a large covered saucepan or Dutch oven over medium heat, until oil is hot but not smoking. Drop in the onion, garlic, cumin, cinnamon stick, and salt and pepper. Cook and stir for 5 minutes, until onion is tender and translucent. Stir in the butternut squash and potato cubes, broth, garbanzo beans, and tomatoes, and bring the mixture to a boil. Reduce heat, cover the pot, and simmer about 20 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the squash and potatoes are tender. Remove the stew from heat, and stir in the olives and lemon zest. In a large saucepan, bring 1 3/4 cup water to a boil. Stir in couscous. Cover and remove from the heat; let stand for 5 minutes. Fluff with a fork; cool. Serve stew over cooked couscous. Garnish each serving with a dollop of yogurt and a sprinkle of cilantro leaves.

recipe.name: Beef Goulash
recipe.description: A great idea for those cold nights when all you want is a warm tasty stew.
recipe.ingredients: 2 tbsp. oil 3 onions, sliced 3 tbsp. paprika Salt and pepper 2 garlic cloves, minced 3 lb. beef stew meat Two 16 oz. cans tomatoes, drained 1/3 cup sour cream (optional)
recipe.directions:
1. In a heavy pot, heat the oil. Add the onions, cover the pot and cook for 10 minutes, until the onions are lightly browned. Stir in the paprika, garlic, salt and pepper. Cook for 1 minute, remove contents of pot with a slotted spoon and set aside.
2. Turn up the heat and brown the beef in the oil left in the pot. Return the onions to the pot with the tomatoes; cover and simmer about 2 hours, until the meat is tender. Serve as is, or remove from the heat and stir in the sour cream. (Do not bring to a boil or the sauce will curdle.) Makes 6 servings.

recipe.name: Beef Bourgon Youl
recipe.description: Rice, meat, sauce and Mushrooms. Fantastic, and good for you, too.
recipe.ingredients: 2 can white mushrooms 4 cans roast beef 1/2 onion, sauteed 2 can gravy 4 cups rice
recipe.directions: Use a medium-sized pot, to boil water. Once boiling, drop rice in for 15 minutes. Stir frequently. Using a turkey pot, at the same time, bake the mixture of mushrooms, onion, gravy, and beef for 25 minutes at 425 degrees. Serve hot - with the turkey pot mix on rice. Serves 8.

recipe.name: Peanutbuttor Sandwich
recipe.description: A weird Sandwich that has peanut, ketcup and salt together.
recipe.ingredients: 2 Pieces of bread 1/8 cup of ketchup 1 gram of salt
recipe.directions: 1) Get a knife and spread ketchup on one piece of bread 2) add salt to peice of bread that the ketchup is on 3) put the peices of bread together 4) eat it 5) If you get sick, barf into the a bag

recipe.name: Slightly Fried Dumpling with Pork
recipe.description: This is a traditional Chinese recipe. I found it from internet. It should taste a little bit salted. And it taste good.
recipe.ingredients: 500 grams (1.1 lb) wheat flour ,250 grams (0.55 lb) minced pork ,5 grams (5/6 tsp) salt, 5 grams (1 tsp) sugar, 5 grams (1 1/4 tsp) MSG, 10 grams (1 1/2 tsp) soy sauce, 15 grams (1 tbsp) cooking wine, 5 grams (1/6 oz) finely cut scallions, 5 grams (1/6 oz) chopped ginger, 150 grams (12 tbsp) cooking oil.
recipe.directions: 1. Mix the minced pork well with the salt, sugar, MSG, soy sauce, cooking wine, scallions and ginger. Add 50 g (3 tbsp) of water and stir in one direction till you feel the sense of elasticity, combine coconut and milk; bring to a boil. 2. Mix the flour with 200 g (2/5 cup) of boiling water, make the dough into long and round shape and reduce to 40 pieces. Press and roll into wrappings each about 6 centimeters (2.4 inches) in diameter. Put in the filling, fold and wrap into crescent shapes, 3. Put the cooking oil into the frying pan, heat and when the oil is about 135-200oC (275-390oF), place the raw dumplings in. Heat for one minute, sprinkle 100 g (6 tbsp) of water and put on the pan cover. Use strong fire to heat five minutes. When the water disappears, the dumplings are ready. (It may take several repetitions to cook all the 40 dumplings because of the size of the pan.)

recipe.name: The tomato fries the egg
recipe.description: This is a traditional Chinese recipe. I found it from internet. It should taste a little bit acid and salted. And it taste good.
recipe.ingredients: Egg 3,Tomato 150 grams,Vegetable oil 4 soupspoon,Salt, monosodium glutamate respectively right amount,Sugar 1 soupspoon.
recipe.directions: After 1st, burns the tomato cleaning with the boiling water, goes to the skin, goes to the peduncle, the slice is ready to be used. 2nd, infiltrates the egg in the bowl, adds the salt, evenly is ready to be used with the chopsticks full whipping. 3rd, the wok puts the oil 3 soupspoon to burn the heat, puts in the egg in the pot to fry is ripely abundant is ready to be used. 4th, the surplus oil will burn the heat, will get down the tomato piece to stir-fry before stewing fries, puts the salt, the sugar fries the moment, will pour into the egg to turn fries several pots namely to become. When stirs fry system this vegetable, wants the strong fire to be intensive. Although this vegetable is the ordinariest simple dish, but fries quality may know. Is called the cooking technique now at last.

recipe.name: Fried Bitter Melon with Eggs
recipe.description: This is a traditional Chinese recipe. I found it from internet. It should taste a little bit bitter and salted. And it taste good.
recipe.ingredients: bitter melon, eggs, 150 grams Vegetable oil 4 soupspoon,Salt, monosodium glutamate respectively right amount,Sugar 1 soupspoon.
recipe.directions: 1) chop bitter melon into two parts, plunge into boilded water for a short while and take them out. get them sliced 2)churn up the eggs and add some flavors 3)add some veg oil and heat it . Then put the spice in ,wait till fragrant. Pour in egg and continue to stir until egg is just cooked through. Stir in the sliced bitter melon, put some flavor and toss well. then serve promptly.

recipe.name: Sugar Cookies
recipe.description: A very simple and sweet dessert that is especially popular over Christmas and during the Holidays (and is Pennsylvania's official cookie).
recipe.ingredients: 3 cups flour 1 tsp baking powder 1 tsp baking soda 1/2 tsp salt 1 cup butter 2 eggs 1 1/2 cups sugar 1 tsp vanilla 1 tsp nutmeg
recipe.directions: Mix the flour, baking powder, baking soda, nutmeg and salt well in bowl. Cut in the cup of butter then beat 2 eggs with the sugar and vanilla. Then add flour to the mixture. Knead and roll into a ball to refridgerate for 1 hour. Roll out, cut and bake at 375 F for 6-11 minutes.

recipe.name: Patties with potatoes
recipe.description: This is a traditional Ukrainian recipe that I got by asking my grandmother. Depending on the ingredients you use and the temperature you eat it at, the patties should always taste exceptionally well with a mild hint of sweetness.
recipe.ingredients: Dough ball 1 cup hot water 1 cup mayonnaise Potatoes with friend onion
recipe.directions: Depending on how many you are making, you want to cut the dough into small pieces. Flatten out the dough balls with a roller to get it as thin as possible, try starting from the center and rolling it out. Place stuffing in the center with a diameter approximately five to seven centimetres. Then fold the dough into a semicircle and squeeze it together so the stuffing doesn?t escape. Finally, fry it to a crisp golden brown and enjoy.

recipe.name: Chilli Chicken
recipe.description: This is my best friend's specialty. As far as I know, she made it from scratch, and it models after such dishes from Indian-Chinese (spicy Chinese) restaurants found in Mississauga, such as Hakka Magic, Eddie's Wok & Roll, China Palace, etc. It can be made according to your preference of spice, but spiciest is best. The sauce should be brown and thick and taste amazing.
recipe.ingredients: 2 teaspoons canola oil 2 small onions, chopped 2 teaspoons garlic paste 1 teaspoons ginger paste 3-5 green chillies, finely chopped 1 1/2 teaspoons Corn Starch 3/4 cup water 3-4 tablespoons soya sauce 1 teaspoon hot sauce 1 large green pepper, chopped in cubes 1 lb (pound) Chicken breast, chopped in cubes. Salt to taste
recipe.directions: In a medium pan, add 2 teaspoons of canola oil. Add 2 teaspoons of garlic paste and 1 teaspoon of ginger paste. Combine it with the chopped green chillies and the chopped onions, stir until golden brown. Add the chopped Chicken breast pieces and add 2 tablespoons of soya sauce. Cover the pan until the chicken is tender. Add the chopped green peppers and add 1 tablespoon of soya sauce. In a bowl, combine 1 1/2 teaspoons of corn starch powder to 3/4 cup of warm water. Add the mixture to the chicken. Add salt to taste. Let it simmer for 3-5 minutes until the sauce thickens. Serve with cooked rice or noodles.

recipe.name: Irish Soda Bread
recipe.description: Traditional Irish recipe passed down through my family. Can be served as a snack or an appetiser. Taste is similar to that of a scone.
recipe.ingredients: 4 cups of sifted, all purpose flour, 1/4 cup of granulated sugar, 1 teaspoon of salt, 1 teaspoon of baking powder, 1 teaspoon of baking soda, 2 tablespoons of caraway seeds, 1 1/3 cups of buttermilk, 1/4 cup of butter, 1 egg (unbeaten), 1 egg yolk (beaten), and 1/2 cup of raisins or currents if desired.
recipe.directions: In a bowl, sift together the flour, sugar, salt, and baking powder. Stir in caraway seeds. Cut butter into small pieces and add to mixture. Combine buttermilk, egg, and baking soda, and stir into flour mixture. Add raisins or currents. Place dough on a floured board. Knead until dough is smooth. Form dough into one round loaf - about two inches high. Use a knife to make a large "X" on the top of the dough. Brush with egg yolk. Bake on a greased cooking sheet at 375 degrees F or 191 degrees C, for 70 minutes or until done. Allow to cool. Serve with butter and jam if you wish. Makes one loaf.

recipe.name: My Fajitas
recipe.description: This is an easy, quick recipe to make that still tastes great.
recipe.spices: Cumin, Coriander Seed, Chili, Paprika, Cayenne
recipe.ingredients: 1/4 cup olive oil 1/4 cup lemon juice 2 chicken breasts, cut into slices 1 onion 2 peppers of any colour 1 teaspoon cumin 1 teaspoon coriander seed 1/2 teaspoon chili 1/2 teaspoon paprika 1/4 teaspoon cayenne Tortillas Optional sides: rice, beans, shredded cheese, salsa, guacamole
recipe.directions: 1. Combine oil, lemon juice and spices in a small bowl. (Add more or less cayenne depending on how spicy you want them to be) 2. Add chopped raw chicken, mix well, and let rest for a few hours in the fridge. 3. Chop onions and peppers 4. Pour marinated chicken and any of the spices left into a frying pan; cook at medium heat. 5. When the chicken is fully cooked or close to it, add the onions and peppers. After the onions are cooked to taste, remove from heat. 6. Serve with warmed tortillas and sides of your choice: rice, beans, shredded cheese, salse, guacamole.

recipe.name: Superbly Grilled Chicken
recipe.description: This simple chicken marinade will easily become one of your summer barbeque favorites! Serve on a bed of rice with mixed veggies.
recipe.spices: Dried oregano Garlic Powder Basil Salt Ground Pepper
recipe.ingredients: 16 skinless ,boneless chicken thighs 12 skinless, boneless chicken breasts 1/2 cup of olive oil 4 lemons 2 TBSP garlic powder 2 TBSP dried oregano 1 TBSP basil 1 TBSP salt 1 TBSP ground pepper
recipe.directions:
1. Place chicken in very large bowl or 2 smaller ones. Pour oil into large measuring cup or bowl. Squeeze about 1 cup of juice from the lemons. Whisk into oil along with garlic powder, oregano, basil, salt and pepper. Pour over Chicken. Mix until evenly coated. Use right away or cover and refrigerate up to one day. 2. Lightly oil grill. Heat BBQ to medium. Remove chicken from marinade. Grill with lid closed for 8 minutes, then baste chicken remaining marinade. Turn chicken and continue to grill with lid closed until chicken feels springy when pressed, 6 to 8 minutes.
For best results, marinate overnight. Fresh garlic may be used instead of garlic powder but will have to be strained from marinade before grilling.

recipe.name: Super Swiss Potato Soup
recipe.description: There was no description that came along with this recipe, but it sounds pretty awesome and self explanatory.
recipe.ingredients: tablespoons butter, divided 1 small shallot, finely chopped 1 1/2 lbs idaho potatoes, peeled and quartered (about 2 medium potatoes) 3 cups low sodium chicken broth 3 cups water 1 1/2 cups milk 1 1/2 cups heavy cream salt, to taste fresh ground black pepper, to taste cayenne pepper, to taste 3/4 cup grated gruyere cheese (about 6 ounces) 2 teaspoons hot paprika 2 scallions, white and green parts, finely sliced
recipe.directions:
Melt 2 tablespoons of butter in a heavy soup pot. Saute shallot in butter until translucent and soft, about 3 minutes. Add the potatoes, chicken broth and water. Bring to a boil, then reduce to a simmer. Cook 15 minutes or until potatoes are soft when poked with a knife-tip. Strain the liquid into a bowl and set aside.
Pass potatoes through a food mill or ricer. Return to soup pot with milk, cream and 1 1/2 cups of cooking liquor. Whisk gently until combined well, but do not overwork the potatoes. Season with salt, pepper and cayenne to taste, then add remaining 1 tablespoon of butter.
Divide Gruyere equally between four soup bowls. Ladle soup over cheese. Sprinkle with paprika and scallions to garnish.

recipe.name: A slightly more interesting tuna salad.
recipe.description: This is ordinary tuna salad, but spiced up a little.
recipe.source: A friend made this for me a few months back.
recipe.ingredients: 1 can of tuna Mayonnaise Relish Bread
recipe.directions: Drain the tuna and put it in a bowl. Add lots of mayonnaise and a couple tablespoons of relish. Add honey mustard and hot sauce as desired. Serve on bread as a sandwhich. Serves 1-2 people.

recipe.name: Fried Wonton
recipe.description: It is a type of dumpling commonly found in a number of Chinese cuisines. Wonton is made with a thin ten centimeter square lye-water pastry wrapper made of wheat flour, water, salt and lye. It is often filled with minced meat, but vegetarian fillings can be substituted.
recipe.ingredients: 4 dried black mushrooms, 1 leaf bok choy, 1 green onion, 1/2 pound ground pork, 1 tablespoon dark soy sauce, 1 teaspoon sesame oil, 1 teaspoon granulated sugar, pinch of salt, 1 egg, lightly beaten, 3 cups oil for deep-frying, 48 wonton wrappers and water
recipe.directions:
Wipe any dirt off the mushrooms. Soak in warm water until softened(20 to 30 minutes). Squeeze out the excess water and chop. Wash and shred the bok choy leaf. Wash and dice the green onion. Mince the ginger until you have 1/2 teaspoons.
In a medium bowl, combine the ground with the dark soy sauce, sesame oil, sugar and salt. Add the lightly beaten egg and the vegetables. This is wonton filling.
Heat the oil to 375 degrees Fahrenheit. While the oil is heating, prepare the wontons. Lay a wonton wrapper in front of you. Place a teaspoon of the filling in the middle. Fold up the wonton so that it resembles a nurse's cap, wetting the edges to seal .
Add the won tons to the hot oil, a few at a time, sliding them in carefully. Deep-fry the wontons in batches until they are golden brown, turning to make sure they brown evenly. Drain on paper towels or a tempura rack if you have one. As with egg rolls, wontons should be served as soon as possible, to ensure they remain crispy. Serve with Sweet and Sour Sauce or red rice wine vinegar.

recipe.name: Mexican Spicy Rice
recipe.description: This recipe takes about 1 hour to make. the spices can be altered to make it more/less spicy this recipe was obtained from a cooking class
recipe.spices: dried oregano, ground cumin, chili powder, ground black pepper
recipe.ingredients: 15ml oil, 1 medium chopped onion, 5ml dried oregano, 5ml ground cumin, 5ml chili powder, 1ml black ground pepper, 125ml white long-grain rice, 185ml vegetable stock, 400ml canned chopped tomatoes with juice, 250ml red canned kidney beans
recipe.directions: Place onions and oil in medium pot on medium heat. Cook, stirring until soft. add herbs and spices. cook for one more minute. add rice, stir to coat with oil, add stock, tomatoes with juice and beans. Bring to a boil, stirring occasionally. Transfer to a casserole, cover and bake at 350F (180C) for 30 minutes.

recipe.name: Grilled Venison Backstrap
recipe.description: Tender chunks of venison are marinated twice, and wrapped in thick bacon before being grilled until crispy on the outside. A venison version of Filet Mignon. This is a heavenly use of the best part of a deer. For the BBQ sauce, I prefer hickory flavored.
recipe.ingredients: null
recipe.directions: 1. Place chunks of venison into a shallow baking dish, and pour enough apple cider in to cover them. Cover, and refrigerate for 2 hours. Remove, and pat dry. Discard apple cider, and return venison to the dish. Pour barbeque sauce over the chunks, cover, and refrigerate for 2 to 3 more hours. 2. Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat. Charcoal is best, but if you must, use gas. Remove meat from the refrigerator, and let stand for 30 minutes, or until no longer chilled. Wrap each chunk of venison in a slice of bacon, and secure with toothpicks. 3. Brush the grill grate with olive oil when hot, and place venison pieces on the grill so they are not touching. The bacon will kick up some flames, so be ready. Grill, turning occasionally, until the bacon becomes slightly burnt, 15 to 20 minutes. The slower, the better. Dig in, and prepare to want more!

recipe.name: Mikes Awesome Chicken
recipe.description: null
recipe.ingredients: 4 chicken breasts 1 cup mayonnaise 1 teaspoon salt 1/2 cup of chopped onions 1/2 cup chopped garlic 1 teaspoon chilli powder
recipe.directions: In a blender, puree onion, garlic, and mayo. Slather mayo sauce on top of the breasts then sprinkle chilli powder and salt on top. Cook for 45 min at 350. Serve with anything. Makes 4 servings.

recipe.name: Chicken Bombay
recipe.description: This tender chicken dish has a mild and slightly sweet curry flavor.
recipe.ingredients: 1/4 cup butter 1/4 cup prepared mustard 1/2 cup liquid honey 1/2 teaspoon seasoned salt 1/4 teaspoon chili powder 1/4 teaspoon onion powder 1/4 teaspoon curry powder 1/2 teaspoon salt 1/4 teaspoon pepper 3 lb.chicken livers
recipe.directions:
Mix first 9 ingredients in a small saucepan. Heat and stir to liquefy.
Roll each part of chicken in sauce. Place in single layer in greased 9 x 13 inch (22 x 33 cm) pan. Bake, uncovered, in 375*F(190*C) oven for about 1 hour until tender, spooning on any remaining sauce at half-time.
Makes 4 servings.

recipe.name: Spicy Meatballs Recipe
recipe.description: This is a nice appetizer for when friends or family come over for gatherings.
recipe.ingredients: 450g lean minced (ground) beef 1 large onion, coarsley chopped 1-2 fresh red, chillies, seeded and chopped 2 crushed garlic cloves 1/2 in cube shrimp paste 1 tablespoon coriander seeds 1 teaspoon cumin seeds 2 teaspoon dark soy sauce 1 teaspoon dark brown sugar Juice of 1/2 lemon A little beaten egg Oil ofr shallow frying Salt Ground black pepper Fresh coriander springs to garnish
recipe.directions: 1. Put the onion, chillies, garlic and shrimp paste in a food processor. Process but do not over-chop or the onion will become too wet and spoil the consistency of the meatballs. Dry-fry the coriander and cumin seeds in a preheated pan for about 1 minute to release the aroma. Do not brown the seeds. Grind with a morta and pestle 2. Put the meat in a large bowl. Stir in the onion mixture. Add the ground coriander and cumin, soy sauce, seasoning, sugar and lemon juice. Bind with a little beaten egg and shape into small but evenly sized balls. 3. Chili the meatballs briefly to firm up, if necessary. Fry in shallow oil. Turn meatballs often until cooked through and browned. This normally takes about 4 to 5 minutes depending on the size of the meatballs. 4. Remove from the pan and drain well on a paper towel. Serve, garnished with coriander springs.

recipe.name: Spicy Meatballs Recipe
recipe.description: This is a nice appetizer for when friends or family come over for gatherings.
recipe.ingredients: 450g lean minced (ground) beef 1 large onion, coarsley chopped 1-2 fresh red, chillies, seeded and chopped 2 crushed garlic cloves 1/2 in cube shrimp paste 1 tablespoon coriander seeds 1 teaspoon cumin seeds 2 teaspoon dark soy sauce 1 teaspoon dark brown sugar Juice of 1/2 lemon A little beaten egg Oil ofr shallow frying Salt Ground black pepper Fresh coriander springs to garnish
recipe.directions: 1. Put the onion, chillies, garlic and shrimp paste in a food processor. Process but do not over-chop or the onion will become too wet and spoil the consistency of the meatballs. Dry-fry the coriander and cumin seeds in a preheated pan for about 1 minute to release the aroma. Do not brown the seeds. Grind with a morta and pestle 2. Put the meat in a large bowl. Stir in the onion mixture. Add the ground coriander and cumin, soy sauce, seasoning, sugar and lemon juice. Bind with a little beaten egg and shape into small but evenly sized balls. 3. Chili the meatballs briefly to firm up, if necessary. Fry in shallow oil. Turn meatballs often until cooked through and browned. This normally takes about 4 to 5 minutes depending on the size of the meatballs. 4. Remove from the pan and drain well on a paper towel. Serve, garnished with coriander springs.

recipe.name: Spicy Mushroom Chicken Pesto Pasta
recipe.description: This is a pasta dish I was bored one day and threw together but ended up liking it a lot.
recipe.spices: Peri-peri chilli pepper, or red chilli pepper
recipe.ingredients:
200g of Pasta (uncooked)
1/2 cup virgin olive oil
sliced musrooms finely minced basil 75g of parmegean cheese chicken breast 1 peri-peri chilli pinch of red chilli pepper 1 clove garlic
recipe.directions: Cook pasta, prepare sauce by finely chopping the basil into small amounts, crush garlic and chop into small pieces, grate parmegean into small amount and mix ingredients into virgin olive oil. Slice chicken into manageable bites. Fry in a pan, add a bit of virgin oilive oil when frying, chop peri-peri chilli and mushrooms into small pieces. add pinch of red chilli, mushrooms and peri peri with the chicken once near cooked. Strain pasta, add sauce and chicken. Enjoy!

recipe.name: INDIAN SPICY BIRYANI
recipe.description: Biriyani is a delicious Indian rice dish which is often reserved for very special occasions such as weddings, parties, or holidays such as Ramzan. It has a lengthy preparation, but the work is definitely worth it. For biryani, always use long grain rice.Basmati rice with its thin, fine grains is the ideal variety to use.
recipe.ingredients: 4 tablespoons vegetable oil 4 small potatoes, peeled and halved 2 large onions, finely chopped 2 cloves garlic, minced 1 tablespoon minced fresh ginger root 1/2 teaspoon chili powder 1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper 1/2 teaspoon ground turmeric 1 teaspoon ground cumin 1 teaspoon salt 2 medium tomatoes, peeled and chopped 2 tablespoons plain yogurt 2 tablespoons chopped fresh mint leaves 1/2 teaspoon ground cardamom 1 (2 inch) piece cinnamon stick 3 pounds boneless, skinless chicken pieces cut into chunks 1 large onion, diced 1 pinch powdered saffron 5 pods cardamom 3 whole cloves 1 (1 inch) piece cinnamon stick 1/2 teaspoon ground ginger 1 pound basmati rice 4 cups chicken stock 1 1/2 teaspoons salt
recipe.directions: In a large skillet, in 2 tablespoons vegetable oil (or ghee) fry potatoes until brown, drain and reserve the potatoes. Add remaining 2 tablespoons oil to the skillet and fry onion, garlic and ginger until onion is soft and golden. Add chili, pepper, turmeric, cumin, salt and the tomatoes. Fry, stirring constantly for 5 minutes. Add yogurt, mint, cardamom and cinnamon stick. Cover and cook over low heat, stirring occasionally until the tomatoes are cooked to a pulp. It may be necessary to add a little hot water if the mixture becomes too dry and starts to stick to the pan. When the mixture is thick and smooth, add the chicken pieces and stir well to coat them with the spice mixture. Cover and cook over very low heat until the chicken is tender, approximately 35 to 45 minutes. There should only be a little very thick gravy left when chicken is finished cooking. If necessary cook uncovered for a few minutes to reduce the gravy. Wash rice well and drain in colander for at least 30 minutes. In a large skillet, heat vegetable oil (or ghee) and fry the onions until they are golden. Add saffron, cardamom, cloves, cinnamon stick, ginger and rice. Stir continuously until the rice is coated with the spices. In a medium-size pot, heat the chicken stock and salt. When the mixture is hot pour it over the rice and stir well. Add the chicken mixture and the potatoes; gently mix them into the rice. Bring to boil. Cover the saucepan tightly, turn heat to very low and steam for 20 minutes. Do not lift lid or stir while cooking. Spoon biryani onto a warm serving dish.

recipe.name: Falafel
recipe.description: null
recipe.ingredients: 1 cup dried chickpeas or 16 oz. can of chickpeas 1 large onion, chopped 2 cloves of garlic, chopped 3 tablespoons of fresh parsley, chopped 1 teaspoon coriander 1 teaspoon cumin 2 tablespoons flour Salt Pepper Oil for frying
recipe.directions: If using dried chickpea's let soak over knight,Drain the chick pea's, put chick pea's in a fresh pot of water. Allow to boil for 5 minutes, then let simmer on low for about an hour.Drain and allow to cool for 15 minutes. Combine chickpeas, garlic, onion, coriander, cumin, salt and pepper (to taste) in medium bowl. Add flour.Mash chickpeas, ensuring to mix ingredients together. The desired constistancy should be a paste Form the mixture into small balls, about the size of a ping pong ball. ( size is not to important just make shure that they are not to large or small) Slightly flatten.Fry in 2 inches of oil at 350 degrees until golden brown (5-7 minutes). Serve hot.

recipe.name: Tourtiere du Saguenay
recipe.description: The tourti?res of the Saguenay-Lac-Saint-Jean area are slow-cooked deep-dish meat pies made with potatoes and various meats (often including game), which are cut into small cubes.
recipe.ingredients: 1/2 pound pork shoulder, cut into 1/2-inch cubes 1/2 pound veal shoulder, cut into 1/2-inch cubes 1/2 pound beef shoulder, cut into 1/2-inch cubes 4 ounces salt pork, cut into 1/2-inch cubes 1 cup finely chopped onions 1 tablespoon chopped garlic 2 medium potatoes, peeled and diced 1/2-inch thick 2 teaspoons salt 1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper 1 egg, beaten
recipe.directions: Using a meat grinder or an electric mixer fitted with a medium coarse die, grind the meat and fat together. In a mixing bowl, combine the ground meat, onions, garlic, salt and pepper. Mix well, cover and refrigerate overnight. Place the potatoes in a medium bowl and cover with water, cover and refrigerate overnight. Combine the meat and potatoes together and mix well. In a mixing bowl, combine the flour and salt. Mix well. Add the shortening and mix until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Add the water and let sit for 1 minute. Using either a fork or your hands, carefully press the mixture together forming a soft ball. Wrap in plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes. Remove the dough from the refrigerator and place it on a lightly floured surface. Cut the dough in half and roll the dough out on the floured surface into a circle about 12-inches in diameter and 1/8-inch thick. Preheat the oven 350 degrees F. Gently fold the circle of dough in half, and then in half again so that you can lift it without tearing it, and unfold into a 9 by 2-inch deep-dish pie pan. Spoon the meat mixture into the pie crust. Brush the edges with the beaten egg. Lay the second pie crust over the meat mixture. Crimp the edges and place in the oven. Bake for 30 minutes. Reduce the heat to 300 degrees F and continue to cook for 1 1/2 hours. Remove from the oven and cool for 10 to 15 minutes before serving. Slice the pie into individual serving. Garnish with parsley.

recipe.name: Curry Beef
recipe.description: This is a traditional Indian-style recipe. I learned it from my mom who found it in a cooking magazine. It should taste slightly spicy and a little bit sweet. You can go without the peas if so desired.
recipe.ingredients: 1 pound of lean ground beef, 1/2 cup thawed frozen peas, 1 cup white rice, 1 can Indian curry
recipe.directions: In a medium saucepan, cook ground beef until cooked all throughout. Meanwhile, boil white rice and thaw out the frozen peas. When meat is cooked, add curry sauce to the simmering meat and mix around until well coated. Scoop rice onto plates and pour the beef and sauce overtop. Finally, sprinkle the thawed peas overtop. Serves 4.

recipe.name: Spaggetti and Meatballs
recipe.description: My family's favorite dinner meal, a basic pasta with our family's homemade meatballs.
recipe.ingredients: 1 bag of spaggetti or pasta of your choice ground beef bread crumbs garlic tomato sauce parmesean cheese
recipe.directions: Cook spagetti as directed on it's package. While doing so, Mix ground beef, garlic and bread crumbs in a bowl until throughly combined, beef should be paste like texture. Roll the mixture into balls and cook in a medium saucepan. Carefully turn each meatball as soon as it's black and hard on the bottom, and continue turning until all sides of the meatballs are black as well. This creates a meatball with cruncy, peel off sides and a juicy center. Serve pasta with tomato sauce and shredded parmesean cheese, and the meatballs on top.

recipe.name: Baked Potatoes with Zesty Tofu Topping .
recipe.description: Recipe from a vegetarian cook book, very healthy and great tasting! great for those who love tofu :) for 3 people
recipe.ingredients: 5 oz Regular or "lite" silken tofu (half of a 10-ounce aseptic pack) 2 tb ketchup or store-bought tomato sauce 1 tb Prepared red or white horseradish; or more to taste 1 tb Dijon mustard 1 Scallion; cut into 4 pieces OR 1 tablespoon freeze-dried chives 1/2 ts Salt 3 Baked potatoes; heated and split
recipe.directions:
In a food processor, combine all of the ingredients except the potatoes and process to a smooth puree. Taste and add more horseradish as desired. (The topping can be prepared up to 5 days ahead, covered, and refrigerated. Bring to room temperature and stir well before using.)
Serve the topping spooned over the hot baked potatoes.

recipe.name: Bengal Canapes
recipe.description: This is a traditional Bengal recipe. I found it from an cooking ebook. Be sure to dose the paprika to taste. And add as much grated parmesan cheese as you like.
recipe.ingredients: 8 slices of bread, 1 tablespoon of butter, 4 oz of chopped ham, half a cup of grated cheddar cheese, mango chutney, grated parmesan cheese, and paprika to taste
recipe.directions: Make toasted bread croutons: Using a small glass, cut 2-inch rounds out of slices of bread (you'll get about two per slice). Lightly toast both sides of bread. Heat butter, ham and cheese together. Spread on toasted bread croutons. Top with a dab of mango chutney and grated Parmesan cheese. Brown slightly under broiler. Sprinkle with a little paprika and serve hot. Note: If you make your own French bread, make a loaf smaller in diameter. Freeze, then slice frozen to crouton thickness or thinner. Makes for better base.

recipe.name: Sauteed Apples
recipe.description: This is great for any meal, but is great for breakfast. The syrup from the apples is great on homemade waffles. You may add raisins to the sauce if you wish.
recipe.ingredients: 1/4 cup butter 4 large tart apples - peeled, cored and sliced 1/4 inch thick 2 teaspoons cornstarch 1/2 cup cold water 1/2 cup brown sugar 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon
recipe.directions: 1. In a large skillet or saucepan, melt butter over medium heat; add apples. Cook, stirring constantly, until apples are almost tender, about 6 to 7 minutes. 2. Dissolve cornstarch in water; add to skillet. Stir in brown sugar and cinnamon. Boil for 2 minutes, stirring occasionally. Remove from heat and serve warm.

recipe.name: Chilean Empanadas
recipe.description: This is a traditional Chilean recipe for a dish famous throughout Latin America.
recipe.ingredients:
DOUGH 3 Cups All-purpose flour 1 Teaspoon Coarse salt 8 Tablespoons Unsalted butter -- cut in bits 2 Egg yolks 2 Tablespoons Tarragon vinegar 9 Tablespoons Cold water
FILLING 1 tablespoon Olive oil 1 teaspoon Spanish paprika 1/8 teaspoon Cayenne 2 tablespoons Unsalted butter 2 medium Onions -- chopped fine 1/2 pound Lean ground beef 1/4 teaspoon Dried oregano 2 teaspoons Coarse salt 1 Bay leaf 1/2 cup Beef stock 3 tablespoons Seedless raisins 8 Kalamata olives -- chopped 1 Hard-boiled egg -- chopped
GLAZE 1 Egg yolk 1 whole Egg 1 tablespoon Cold water
recipe.directions: Sift the flour and salt into a bowl. Add the butter, egg yolks, and vinegar and mix quickly and thoroughly with your fingertips until all ingredients are well incorporated. Add 5 tablespoons of the water and continue mixing, adding just enough of the remaining water, a little at a time, to make a firm dough. Refrigerate until ready to use. For the filling, heat the oil and butter in a saute pan. Add the onions and saute over medium heat until light brown around the edges, about 5 minutes. Add the beef, oregano, salt, and bay leaf and cook until all the liquid has evaporated. Add the stock and continue cooking until the stock has almost -- but not quite -- evaporated. Mix in the raisins and olives. Remove from the heat and let cool. Stir in the chopped hard-boiled egg. Correct the seasoning with salt to taste. Set aside. Preheat the oven to 375 degrees. On a floured board, roll out the dough about 1/8-inch thick, shaping it into a 16-inch square. Cut out circles about 5-inches in diameter. Knead and re-roll the scraps and cut into additional circles. Place a heaping tablespoon of the meat filling about 1/2-inch from the edge of each circle. Brush the border of the circle with juices from the filling or with water. Fold the dough over to form a half-moon, pressing the edges together with your fingertips or the tines of a fork to seal. Prick the top of each empanada once or twice with the tines of the fork. Repeat this process until all the empanadas are assembled. Make the glaze by beating the egg yolk and egg with the water. Spread parchment paper on a baking sheet. Arrange the empanadas on top and brush with glaze. Bake for 30 minutes, or until golden. Remove the baking tray from the oven, and transfer the empanadas to a serving platter or individual plates, and serve hot.

recipe.name: Potato Salad
recipe.description: Whether it is for a family picnic, summer Sunday dinner or any day tasty side dish, there is something about classic potato salad that keeps us all coming back for more.
recipe.ingredients: 4 cups potatoes, cooked, peeled and cubed (about 6 or 7 whole potatoes) 1 cup Miracle Whip or mayonnaise 1 teaspoon mustard 1/2 teaspoon celery seeds 1/2 teaspoon salt 1/8 teaspoon pepper 2 hard boiled eggs, chopped 1/2 cup onion, chopped 1/2 cup celery, finely chopped 1/2 cup sweet pickles, finely chopped
recipe.directions:
Boil potatoes whole, with the skins on, in salted water for about 15 to 20 minutes until they are tender in the middle when you prick with a fork. Do not overboil or the salad will be mushy.
Cool the potatoes a bit then peel them, cut into cubes and place in a large bowl.
In a separate smaller bowl combine the mayonnaise, mustard, celery seeds, salt and pepper. Mix well. Add the chopped eggs, onion, celery and pickles and mix together to combine.
Pour dressing over the cubed potatoes and mix lightly so as not to break up the potatoes too much. Cover and chill until time to serve.

recipe.name: Cilantro-Potatoes
recipe.description: This is a modified version of a traditional Indian recipe I found from allrecipes.com. I have substituted some ingredients for similar flavours that are conveniently available in any grocery store. The result was a quick and simple recipe with a delectable harmony of spices.
recipe.spices: cumin seeds green chile peppers chili powder coriander
recipe.ingredients: 4 large potatoes, cubed 1 tablespoon olive oil 1 teaspoon cumin seeds 2 green chile peppers, chopped 1 inch piece of fresh ginger root, finely chopped 1 teaspoon chili powder 1 teaspoon coriander, ground 1 lime, juiced 1/2 teaspoon salt 1 bunch fresh cilantro, chopped
recipe.directions: 1. Place the potatoes in a saucepan with enough water to cover. Bring to a boil, and cook 10 minutes, until tender. Drain and allow to cool slightly, 2. Heat the oil in a large pan over medium heat. Lightly toast the cumin seeds in the heated oil. Mix in the green chile peppers and ginger. Season with chili powder and coriander. Stir in the potatoes, and cook about 5 minutes. Season with salt, and lime juice. Continue cooking for about 15 more minutes. Mix in the chopped cilantro before serving. Makes 4 servings.

recipe.name: Chicken biryani
recipe.description: This is a traditional Indian recipe. i asked my mom to help me with this recipe and its a bit spicey
recipe.ingredients: 1 cup(250 ml) frozen peas 1 onion, thinly sliced 2 carrots, diced 6 skinless, boneless chicken thighs or 3 skinless, bonless breasts 1/4 cups(50 ml) biryani curry paste 1 cup(250 ml) basmati rice 2 cups(500 ml) water 1/2 tsp (2 ml) salt 1 cup(250 ml) coarsely chopped cilantro
recipe.directions: Measure out peas and leave at room temperature. Prepare vegetables. Lightly coat a large saucepan with vegetable oil and set over medium heat. Add onion and carrots. Stir occasionally until onion has softened, 3 to 5 min. Meanwhile cut chicken into bite-size pieces. Add to vegetables and saute until lightly golden, about 5min. Add biryani paste and stirr until chicken is well coated. Mix in rice, water and salt. Cover and bring to a boil. Stir, then reduce heatto low. Simmer, covered for 15min. Then mix in peas. Cover and continue to simmer until water is absorbed, from 5 to 7 mor min. Remove from heat. Sprinkle with cilantro. Scoop into large bowl.

recipe.name: Cilantro-Potatoes
recipe.description: This is a modified version of a traditional Indian recipe I found from allrecipes.com. I have substituted some ingredients for similar flavours that are conveniently available in any grocery store. The result was a quick and simple recipe with a delectable harmony of spices.
recipe.spices: cumin seeds green chile peppers chili powder coriander
recipe.ingredients: 4 large potatoes, cubed 1 tablespoon olive oil 1 teaspoon cumin seeds 2 green chile peppers, chopped 1 inch piece of fresh ginger root, finely chopped 1 teaspoon chili powder 1 teaspoon coriander, ground 1 lime, juiced 1/2 teaspoon salt 1 bunch fresh cilantro, chopped
recipe.directions: 1. Place the potatoes in a saucepan with enough water to cover. Bring to a boil, and cook 10 minutes, until tender. Drain and allow to cool slightly, 2. Heat the oil in a large pan over medium heat. Lightly toast the cumin seeds in the heated oil. Mix in the green chile peppers and ginger. Season with chili powder and coriander. Stir in the potatoes, and cook about 5 minutes. Season with salt, and lime juice. Continue cooking for about 15 more minutes. Mix in the chopped cilantro before serving. Makes 4 servings.

recipe.name: Coconut Sambol
recipe.description: This is a traditional Sri Lankan tamil recipe. My family makes it to eat with other dishes such as string hoppers, rice and stuff.
recipe.spices: chili powder made sri lankan style
recipe.rating: WAY TOO HOT EVEN FOR A LANKAN TO HANDLE
recipe.ingredients: 2 cups grated fresh or packaged unsweetened coconut flesh of 1/2 coconut 1 medium onion 1/4 teaspoon of chilli powder 2 teaspoons lemon or lime juice 1/2 level teaspoon salt
recipe.directions: To make the coconut sambal, quite simply grate the coconut and the onion straight into a bowl, then sprinkle in the chilli powder, the lemon or lime juice and the salt. Stir to get everything nicely blended, then sprinkle just a tiny dusting of chilli powder over the top, cover and chill slightly until needed.

recipe.name: Potato Skins
recipe.description: A plate full of crispy potato skins, filled with melty cheddar cheese, and topped with bacon bits, sour cream and green onions.
recipe.ingredients: 6 small to medium sized russet baking potatoes (total 3 pounds) Olive oil Canola oil or grapeseed oil Kosher salt Freshly ground pepper 6 strips of bacon 4 ounces grated cheddar cheese 1/2 cup sour cream 2 green onions, thinly sliced, including the greens of the onions
recipe.directions:
1. Scrub the potatoes clean then bake the potatoes using an oven set to 400?F for an hour.
2. While the potatoes are cooking, cook the bacon strips in a frying pan on medium low heat for 10 to 15 minutes, or until crisp. Drain on paper towels. Let cool. Crumble.
3. Remove the potatoes from the oven and let cool enough to handle. Cut in half horizontally. Use a spoon to carefully scoop out the insides, reserving the scooped potatoes for another use, leaving about 1/4 of an inch of potato on the skin.
4. Increase the heat of the oven to 450?F. Brush or rub grapeseed oil or canola oil (or another high smoke point oil) all over the potato skins, outside and in. Sprinkle with salt. Place on a baking rack in a roasting pan. Cook for 10 minutes on one side, then flip the skins over and cook for another 10 minutes. Remove from oven and let cool enough to handle.
5. Sprinkle the insides with freshly ground black pepper, cheddar cheese, and crumbled bacon. Return to the oven. Broil for an additional 2 minutes, or until the cheese is bubbly. Remove from oven. Use tongs to place skins on a serving plate. Add a dollop of sour cream to each skin, sprinkle with green onions.

recipe.name: Dragonbreath Chili
recipe.description:
Use: Ocasionally belch flame at enemies struck in melee for the next 10min.
Grants a somewhat dragon-like quality, belching this fire doesnt hurt you. However this flame is extremely hot to others! Eat with caution.
recipe.ingredients: Mystery Meat, Flame Sac, Hot Spices, Onions, Garlic, Salt, Pepper
recipe.directions:
Gather your ingredients. Flame sac can be obtained from slaying the nearest dragon.
Heat oil in heavy saucepan over medium-high heat. Add onions, garlic, Saute for about 8 minutes Add ground Mystery Meat and cook until brown, breaking up meat with a spatula as it cooks. Add chili salt, pepper, and Hot Spices to the meat. Stir in Flame Sac innards. Add pieces of the flame sac outside for even more spice. Reduce heat to low and simmer for at least 1 and a half hours.

recipe.name: Fireball Burgers
recipe.description: Very spicy bugers.
recipe.ingredients: 4oz ground beef, tobasco sauce, pepperjack cheese, spicy barbeque sauce, lettuce, tomato, mayonnaise, hamburger buns
recipe.directions: 1. Prepare the patties, seasoning them with a dash of salt and a liberal amount of Tabasco sauce and pepper. 2. Cook the burgers; grilling is your best bet here. When you flip the burgers, add more pepper and Tabasco sauce. 3. When finished, let it sit momentarily, then put a slice of cheese on each patty and microwave them until the cheese melts. 4. Add more Tabasco sauce as well as the BBQ sauce and mayo. Don't add much mayo, or it will nullify the BBQ. 5. Combine bun, lettuce, and tomato.

recipe.name: SLOP
recipe.description: This is my favorite thing to make at the end of the week with what I got in the fridge, Looks a bit ugly but man is it good.
recipe.ingredients:
Pottato(whole and pre-cooked or caned) Chicken Brest Smokey BBQ Sauce Cooking oil of some kind
Optional ingredients(Leftovers)
Rice Vegies(corn's good) Apple slices(for sweetness) Whatever really
recipe.directions: In a fryingpan gresed with cooking oil, on a relitivly hot seting(around 7 or 8 on my stove) Begin cooking the Pottatos. Usualy I throw them in and cut them into tinyer peices in the pan. Once they have browned a bit take them out and put the chicken(sliced thin) in, cook it untill it starts to get white then throw the Pottatoes back in. Stiring consistantly throw whatever else you want inand coat libraly with your favorite BBQ Sauce. Let cook until the chicken is white all the way through(Unless you don't mind samonella). and eat it. It's good I swear.

recipe.name: Shepherd's Pie
recipe.description: Mashed potatoes and meat, what more could you want?
recipe.ingredients: Ground Lamb or Beef: 1 lb Frozen Green Peas: 1/2 cup Carrots: 1/4 cups, chopped Onion: 1 medium, chopped Garlic: 1 clove, diced Worcestershire Sauce: 2 tbsp (or replace it with your favorite steak sauce) Potatoes: 4 medium, peeled and sliced Onion Spring: 1 tbsp, chopped Cream Cheese: 1-2 tbsp Milk: 1-2 tbsp Butter: 2-3 tbsp Vegetable Oil: 1 tbsp Salt Pepper
recipe.directions:
1. Boil potatoes in salted water for 15 min or till tender.
2. Meanwhile, saute chopped onion, carrots and garlic with vegetable oil in a frying pan for 5 min.
3. Add ground meat and saute for 10 min until no longer pink. Add salt, pepper and Worcestershire sauce and cook for 5 more min. Add frozen peas and cook 2-3 more min.
4. Mash hot potatoes and melt butter with them. Add milk, chopped onion springs and cream cheese. Use a spoon to mix them well. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
5. Transfer meat to a baking dish and cover with mashed potatoes.
6. Cook in 400 F preheated oven for 30 min until crisp on top.

recipe.name: Irish Spicy Cornbread
recipe.description: A nice mildly spicy cornbread recipe. Great with chili. You may want to adjust the amount of cayenne and hot sauce to taste. For this recipe I use cast iron pans that have 5 small corn cob shapes in them, but any cast iron frying pan will do.
recipe.ingredients: 2 cups all-purpose flour 1 cup yellow cornmeal 1/3 cup white sugar 4 1/2 teaspoons baking powder 1 1/2 teaspoons salt 1 1/2 teaspoons cayenne pepper 1/2 cup shortening 1 1/2 cups milk 2 eggs, beaten 4 1/2 teaspoons hot pepper sauce
recipe.directions: Preheat oven and skillet to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). In a large bowl, mix together flour, cornmeal, sugar, baking powder, salt, and cayenne pepper. Cut in shortening until the mixture resembles coarse bread crumbs. In a small bowl, beat together milk, eggs and hot pepper sauce. Stir milk mixture into the flour/cornmeal mixture until just blended. Remove hot skillet from oven, spray with non-stick cooking spray and pour batter into skillet. Bake in preheated oven for 20 to 25 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into center of loaf comes out clean.

recipe.name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
recipe.description: This is a simple dish best served hot, ontop-of/cut-into rice. Being such a basic recipe, there is a lot of room for you to add your own twists. Most of the flavour comes from the juice, which coats the rice, but you can spice the beef as you like for extra flavour. *NOTE* There are different types of V8 juice available, including "Low Sodium" Should you choose to use this type, you can add a pinch of salt on top of the dish once prepared to give the same flavour. Unless you really like salt, don't add salt if you're using a standard V8 (the taste can be overpowering).
recipe.source: Common in most Prepared Foods sections of your local Grocery Store.
recipe.ingredients: Bell Peppers (any colour) Medium Ground Beef Salt and Pepper Rice Chopped Onion (1 per 6 peppers) Optional Additional Spices Optional Cheese, grated (any type will do)
recipe.directions: Saut?e the onion, then combine with beef, until brown (adding spices and and stirring regularily), meanwhile chopping some bell peppers in half, length-wise. Flash-fry the pepper-halves briefly (microwave, high-oven heat, or in a frying-pan for about a minute or two in all cases), then pack the beef into the peppers (at this point, add the cheese on top) and place into a deep flat dish. Add V8 juice into base of dish, and over peppers (safely half the height of the peppers) then bake in an oven at a medium heat (until the cheese browns).

recipe.name: Beef and Carrott Stir-Fry
recipe.description: This is a traditional Canadian Recipe. I found it from an old cooking book in my grandmothers house. It's main ingredients are Beef and rice.
recipe.ingredients: 2/3 lb rum steak 1 small carrot 1 stalk celery 3 cayenne pepper 1/3 oz. scallion 1 clove garlic
recipe.directions:
Chinese Recipe : Stir Fried Beef with Carrot
Serves 4
Ingredients:
2/3 lb rum steak 1 small carrot 1 stalk celery 3 cayenne pepper 1/3 oz. scallion 1 clove garlic
Seasoning A: ? tsp salt ? tsp MSG 1 tbsp rice wine 1 tsp soy sauce
Seasoning B: 1 tbsp rice wine 1 tbsp soy sauce 1/3 tsp vinegar 1/3 tsp MSG 1 tsp sugar ? tsp caramel sauce (optional) ? tbsp sesame oil Cooking oil
Directions:
1. Cut the beef along the grain into 2 1/2 inch long strips. Peel the carrot and remove the tough parts of celery. Cut the carrot and celery into 2 1/2 inch strips.
2. Cut the cayenne pepper into 1/2 inch pieces and remove the seeds. Shred the scallion into 2 inch strops. Slice the garlic.
3.Pour 2 cups of oil and drop the beef into fry. Stir occasionally and cook for approximatly twenty minutes on medium. Add seasoning and vegetbles and cook until desired tenderness.

recipe.name: Manti
recipe.description: This is a traditional north-central asian recipe. I found it from a web site. It is very tasty.
recipe.ingredients: * 3 cups all purpose flour * 1 cup water * 1 large egg * 1 tablespoon olive oil * 1 teaspoon salt * 250 gr ground meat * 1 large onion (chopped in very small pieces) * Salt and black pepper * 2 cups plain yogurt * 2-3 cloves of garlic * 1/4 cup water * 1/2 teaspoon salt * 6-7 tablespoons olive oil * 2 teaspoons red pepper ( hot or mild, its up to you)
recipe.directions: 1. In a large bowl, stir together the flour, water, egg, olive oil and salt. 2. Knead them very well until the dough is formed. The dough should be smooth and not sticky. If you feel it is sticky, add a little bit more flour. 3. Cover the bowl with some plastic wrap and let stand at cool room temperature for an hour. 4. Meanwhile, prepare the filling. In a medium bowl, put onions, meat, salt and black pepper. Knead them together for one minute (do not cook.) 5. Lightly dust a work surface and a rolling pin with flour. Divide the dough into 4 equal balls. Roll out each ball into sheets as thin as you can roll out, but be careful don't tear it. 6. Cut each sheet into squares of about 1.5"x1.5".Put a very small piece of filling at the center of each square. Continue until the dough is finished. 7. As you see below, bring the opposite corners together and make a triangle or, fold them to make a rectangle. Both works fine. Press the sides firmly. (Don't forget to hide your chickpeas for the game. :) 8. Bring two of the adjacent corners together as shown in the picture. 9. In a large pot, boil the water and add a little bit salt, olive oil. Add Manti and stir. Cook for about 15 minutes. Please check while cooking. Don't overcook. 10. Meanwhile, prepare the sauces.
