Firstly, in a small bowl, grate cloves of garlic and add yogurt, water, salt. Stir them together. Secondly, in a separate sauce pan add olive oil and red pepper, stir together and cook them only for half a minute. 11. When Manti is ready, you can drain well or not, the way you like, it is up to you. 12. Serve warm with yogurt sauce and red sauce.

recipe.name: Baked Chicken with Stuffing
recipe.description: This is a clssic recipe. It's generally loved by the whole family, as it contains only common ingredients, and they are all well loved. It is also large enough to serve many, and leftovers are easily kept.
recipe.ingredients: 2 Cans of Campbell's Cream of Chicken Soup Any Amount of Large Chicken Breasts Stuffing (Stovetop Brand usually works best)
recipe.directions: In a large caserole dish, place chicken breasts in, with enough space in between them. You cannot use GridBagLayout to organize the chicken, sorry. Open and pour the two cans of Cream of Chicken Soup into the caserole dish, and spread evenly throughout. Next, take the pre-cooked stuffing/dressing and cover the chicken. Spread this out evenly. Set the oven to 450 degrees fahrenheit, and place on middle rack. Cook for 45 minutes, or until stuffing/dressing on top is a crispy brown.

recipe.name: Waterboard Me Smoothie
recipe.description: Pain is the best pick-me-up.
recipe.rating: Do not injest. If injested accidentally induce vomiting then immediately seek medical attention.
recipe.ingredients: 10 Naga Jolokia peppers 1 large onion 2 cups wasabi 5 cups tobasco sauce
recipe.directions: Add ingredients to blender and blend until eyes start to water.

recipe.name: Homemade Pasta Sauce
recipe.description: This is a delicious pasta sauce perfect for Spaghetti or Lasagna.
recipe.ingredients: 2 Cans Hunts' Tomato Sauce 1 Can Hunts' tomato paste 1 lb. Fresh Mushrooms 1 Red Pepper 1 Green Pepper 1 Large Onion
recipe.directions: In a large pot, pour the tomato sauce and paste in. Chop all other ingredients to a fine size. Cook the sauce for 4 - 5 hours on very low heat. Add to your favorite pasta.

recipe.name: Easy Ground Beef and Pasta Casserole
recipe.description: This is a basic but hearty and delicious casserole, made with pasta and ground beef, along with tomatoes and seasonings. Top this casserole with Monterey Jack cheese or use a blend shredded American and Jack or Cheddar cheeses.
recipe.ingredients: 3 cups uncooked medium shells or mini penne pasta 1 pound lean ground chuck or ground round (85 to 90% lean) 1 cup chopped onion 1 cup chopped celery 1 clove garlic, minced 1/2 teaspoon salt 1 can (14.5 ounces) diced tomatoes with juice 1 large can (15 ounces) tomato sauce 2 teaspoons granulated sugar 1 cup shredded Monterey Jack cheese
recipe.directions:
Heat oven to 350?. Lightly spray or grease an 11x7-inch baking dish.
Cook pasta according to package directions until just tender; drain well. In a large skillet over medium heat, saute beef with onion and celery, breaking up with a spoon. Cook, stirring, until almost cooked through. Add garlic and salt and cook for 2 to 3 minutes longer. Stir in the tomatoes, tomato sauce, granulated sugar, and the cooked drained pasta. Spoon into the prepared baking dish and cover dish tightly with foil. Bake for 30 to 40 minutes, or until hot and bubbly. Remove foil. Sprinkle with the cheese and bake uncovered for about 5 minutes longer, or until cheese is melted. Serves 4 to 6.

recipe.name: Mexican Wrapped Hotness
recipe.description: This is your basic Mexican dish, its what the average Mexican eats for breakfast, lunch or dinner.
recipe.spices: Hot Tamolies and MegaDeth Hot Sauce
recipe.ingredients:
1 Large Soft Taco
1/4 cup Hot Tamolies
250ml MegaDeth Hot Sauce
50g Grounded Hot Tamolies
100g Crumbled Nachos
1/4 Cup Guacamole
1/4 Cup Salsa
1/3 Cup Ground Beef
100g Sliced Cheese
recipe.directions: Take your hot tamolies, and dip them in the MegaDeth hot sauce. Next, bread them in the crushed hot tamolies. Finally throw all your ingredients onto the Soft Taco and wrap it up.

recipe.name: Granola Bars!
recipe.description: Great Tasting Homemade Granola Bars
recipe.ingredients: 3 cups rolled oats 1 cup sliced almonds 1 cup sunflower seed 1 cup raisins 1 cup craisins (optional) 1 cup chocolate chips (optional) 1/2 cup sesame seed 1/2 cup unsweetened coconut 1/4 cup butter or margarine, melted 1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk
recipe.directions: 1 Preheat oven to 325 F (160C). 2 Grease baking sheet well. (Or use parchment paper). 3 Combine dry ingredients in a large bowl. 4 Stir in melted butter and sweetened condensed milk. 5 Mix well and pour onto baking sheet. 6 Press down evenly with your hands using waxed paper. 7 Bake for 25-30 minutes until golden brown (could be as long as 40-45 minutes depending on how crunchy you want them). 8 Cool for 15 minutes and cut. 9 Let cool completely and store in airtight container.

recipe.name: Brocoli Salad
recipe.description: A sweet, creamy salad with lots of brocoli
recipe.ingredients: Broccoli Bacon green onions 2 cups cheese 6tbs vinegar ? cup sugar 1 cup mayonnaise
recipe.directions: Add all ingrediants together in a large bowl and mix well

recipe.name: Invigorating Borscht
recipe.description: Borscht! From Russia! You know, that famous crimson soup...
recipe.ingredients: 1 onion2 cloves of garlic4 potatoes5 carrots1/3 of a cabbage head6 table spoons of tomato sauce1 can of beans1 small handful of dill0-1 package of sour cream0-1 table spoon of salt0-1 table spoon of pepper2 bouillon cubes1 small quantity of olive oil1/2 Beat1 table spoon of sugar6 table spoons of tomato sauce
recipe.directions: Fill a large (larger than most - the kind where most of your head could fit into it... if it had to) casserole about 3/4 full of water. Start boiling it with the two bouillon cubes. Chop up all the vegetables (not super-fine, the slices could be perhaps each be 5mm thick). Spread some oil on a frying pan and fry the onion on it, then transfer it to the water once it softens up - don't let it get brown! Next, fry ONE OF the garlic cloves, you can salt it as you fry. Throw it in the water after a couple of minutes! Next, do the same thing with the beat (fry, salt and throw). Then repeat for the potatoes. Then, for the beats. Then, for the cabbage. Finally, add the beans, the sugar and the tomato paste. Then let it sit and boil under light fire for some 10-15 minutes (until cabbage isn't hard anymore). Finally, disable the fire, and throw in the 2nd garlic clove and the dill. Important: Wait AT LEAST two hours before eating. Eat with sour-cream. Also nice to eat with an egg.

recipe.name: Ground Steak Souffle
recipe.description: This is a recipe that can serve up to four people (as per the listed ingredients). I found this in with recipe's that were kept together at my home. It should taste pretty good, if memory serves, and it shouldn't be spicy, although you may add cayenne pepper to the souffle topping, as well as other herbs to the ground steak.
recipe.ingredients:
Ground Steak: 1 small green sweet pepper 1 small onion 2 tomatoes 1/2 cup sliced mushrooms 1 tablespoon oil 16-oz. of ground beef pinch of oregano and/or mixed herbs
Souffl? Topping: 1/2 cup finely grated Cheddar cheese 1/4 cup evaporated milk 2 eggs salt pinch of cayenne pepper
recipe.directions: Chop the pepper, removing seeds and core, skin and chop the onion, skin and slice the tomatoes. Heat the oil and lightly fry all the vegetables until onion is golden brown. Place the ground beef in the ovenproof dish, top with the vegetables. Sprinkle seasonings on top. Make souffl? by melting the cheese in the evaporated milk in a bowl over hot water. Allow to cool slightly. Stir in the egg yolks. Beat egg whites stiffly, then fold in the cheese mixture. Season. Place on top of the meat and vegetables. Bake until the souffl? is well risen and lightly browned. About 20-25 minutes. Serves 4.

recipe.name: Masal Dosa
recipe.description: This is a traditional south indian recipe. i know this for a long while. It tastes good with some spicy curry.
recipe.ingredients: 1 1/2 cups rice 1/2 cup urad dal salt to taste Oil Masala Filling: 2 large potatoes 1 medium onion (chopped) 1/2 teaspoon yellow split peas 1/2 teaspoon mustard seed 1/2 teaspoon turmeric 1-2 green chili 1 tablespoon oil salt to taste
recipe.directions: * Separately soak rice and urad dal at least 6 hour or overnight in water. * Grind to paste. * Mix together, add salt with water to make batter. * Leave in room temperature overnight. * Mix onion and chilies to the thin batter. * Heat pan or griddle with little ghee or oil. * Spread the mix on pan in circular motion to make thin Dosa. * Cook on both the sides, if desired.

recipe.name: Papaya Salad
recipe.description: An southeast asian dish that`s very popular in Thailand and Cambodia. It is normally eaten with sticky rice though tastes just as good with white rice as well. A mixure of sour and spicy but extremely tasty.
recipe.ingredients: green papaya (shredded) garlic chilli peppers cherry tomatoes fish sauce shrimp paste lime juice salt sugar peanuts(optional) dried shrimp or salted crabs(optional)
recipe.directions: Using a mortar and pestle, pound the garlic, cherry tomatoes and chilli a few times until it's just the right spicyness for you. Add the fish sauce, shrimp paste and lime juice and add a pinch of salt and sugar to the mixture. Afterward, add your shredded papaya and kneed the mixture until it's nicely blended and toss it to mix the ingredients. If you want peanuts and/or shrimp/crab, add them with the fish sauce etc. There should be a bit of liquid but not so much that the papaya is downing in it. Tasting the food regularly is the best judge of measurement for the ingredients.

recipe.name: Mac 'n Cheeseburger Casserole
recipe.description: A cheesy beef and pasta dish with mushrooms, peppers, onions, celery, and tomatos from Rediscover Campbell's. M'm! M'm! Good!
recipe.ingredients: 1 lb of extra lean ground beef 2 cups of sliced mushroom 1 cup of chopped red and yellow peppers 1/2 cup of chopped onions 1/2 cup of chopped celery 1 can of stewed tomatoes, undrained 1 can of Campbell's Condensed Low Fat Cream of Mushroom Soup 2 cups of uncooked whole wheat elbow pasta 2 tbsp of worcestershire sauce 1 tbsp of chili powder 1/4 cup of shredded sharp cheddar cheese
recipe.directions: cook beef until browned at medium-high heat in large non-stick skillet. Add mushrooms, peppers, onions, and celery. Cook and stir for 3 minutes. Place mixture into shallow 2 qt (2L) baking dish. Stir in all other ingredients, except cheese. Bake, covered, at 400 degrees F (200 degrees C) until pasta is tender - about 50 minutes. Sprinkle with cheese and let stand 5 minutes before serving. Makes 6 servings.

recipe.name: Apple Chicken Quesadilla
recipe.description: This is a traditional Mexican recipe. I found it in my mum's old notebook on cookery. It should taste somewhere between mild and sweet. Some people like it with pepper.
recipe.ingredients: 4 Flour tortillas (approximately 8-inches wide) 1 cup cooked, shredded or chopped, chicken meat 1/4 lb cheddar or Monterey jack cheese, sliced or grated 1 apple, sliced 1/4 cup salsa
recipe.directions:
Heat a large skillet on medium high heat. Place one tortilla in the skillet. Flip it a couple of times with a spatula, then let it sit in the pan heating up until air pockets form and parts of the tortilla begin to puff up. Flip it again.
Place cheese slices on half of the tortilla, at least 1/2-inch from the edge of the tortilla. Add chicken pieces on top of the cheese. Fold the tortilla over like an omelette, and press down on the folded tortilla with the spatula. Lower the heat to medium. At this point, if you have enough room in your skillet, you can add a second tortilla to the pan to begin to heat it up.
When the cheese inside the quesadilla has melted, remove the quesadilla to a cutting board. Open it wide and layer on apple slices and salsa. Fold the tortilla back again, and cut it into 3 triangles, as if you were cutting a pie. (You don't have to cut the quesadilla into triangles, it just makes it easier for kids to eat.)
Repeat for each tortilla.
Makes 12 Quesadilla triangles.

recipe.name: Greek food
recipe.description: Greek food is a wonderful mix of oriental and European dishes, cooked using different methods, from frying to broiling to boiling. Food in Greece is both easy to make, as the following recipes show, and delightful. Much of Greek food is seasonal and a lot of it is prepared during different times of the year, mainly around dates of religious events, such as Easter, Christmas or New Year.
recipe.ingredients: 1 pound of boneless chuck 1 pound of boneless lamb, 1 pound of boneless turkey, 1 pound of boneless pork, 2 teaspoons of sea salt, 1/2 teaspoon of freshly ground black pepper, 1/8 teaspoon of savory, 2 tablespoons of prepared mustard, 2 tablespoons of extra virgin olive oil, 4 tablespoons of Worcestershire sauce, 1 pound of feta cheese, crumbled,2 cups of water
recipe.directions: Cut all meat into small chunks, approximately the same size (about 1 to 1 1/2 inch squares).In a large bowl, pot, or pan, combine all ingredients, cover, and place in the refrigerator to marinate for about 10 hours.Preheat oven to 390?F (200?C).Transfer meats and marinade to a covered casserole dish or dutch oven and cook at 390?F (200?C) for 1 hour and 30-45 minutes until all meat is fork tender.

recipe.name: Stir Fried Ginger Chicken
recipe.description: This is a very tradition Cambodian dish. Warm and comforting with a very gentle heat, it is a perfect dish for cold days.
recipe.ingredients: 1LB of chicken breast 1 sliced onion 2 cloves of chopped garlic 1 chopped green onion 1 tbsp of oyster sauce 1/4 tbsp of salt 1/2 cup of finely chopped ginger 2 tbsp of vegetable oil
recipe.directions: Slice the chicken breast into thin slices, about 2"x2" and 1/8" thick; set aside. Heat up the vegetable oil in a pan at med-high heat. Add the garlic to the pan and cook for 1-2 min. Add the ginger and cook for another 2-3 min. Add the chicken, salt and oyster sauce. 2 min before the chicken is done, and the green onions. When the chicken is done, remove from the heat and serve with steamed rice.

recipe.name: Sticky Buns
recipe.description: Sticky cinnamon buns, way to good to be healthy, family recipe for holiday's. For sharing with family and friends.
recipe.ingredients: 1 c milk, 1/2 c sug, 2 tsp salt, 1/2 c shortening (marg), 1/2 c water, 1 pkg yeast, 1 egg, 2c flour, 2 1/2 - 3c flour, 1/4 c butter, 1/2 c br sug, (optional) pecans and half cherries. on dough; 1/4 c sugar, 1 tsp cinnamon, 1/2 C nuts or raisins.
recipe.directions: Add and scald milk, sugar, salt, shortening (marg) -mix. Add water, yeast (instant or bread machine), egg, flour -beat. Add more flour -knead (work in with hands). Let rise 1 1/4 hr at 80F. Makes rolls in two 9x9 pans. Sticky part is half recipe. In pan; add butter, brown sugar, pecans*, and half cherries* (*optional). On dough: sugar, cinnamon, nuts/rasins -roll out dough and moisten with wet brush then sprinkle with mix - roll up and seal long edge, cut into 12 slices -place slices flat in pan -rise 1 hr. bake at 400 for 20 min or till done.

recipe.name: Cuban Tostenes
recipe.description: This is a traditional Cuban appetizer or side dish that is used to accompany any main main course. Tostenes are fried squished plantains and are often served with a garlic sauce.
recipe.ingredients: 2 Whole Green Plantains Vegetable Oil 12 Garlic Cloves
recipe.directions: Fill a frying pan with vegetable oil until the oil is around an inch/ inch and a half deep. Put the stove on high and then once the oil is heated, add in plantain slices that are around an inch thick. Fry for 2-4 minutes and then flip the slices. Fry for another 2-4 minutes and then let cool for 5 minutes. Once cooled, flatten the slices and fry them once more for 2 minutes. The garlic dipping sauce is optional and goes great with this dish.

recipe.name: Home Made Mac n Cheese
recipe.description: This is a traditional Pasta recipe. I saw my father making it once. It should taste very cheesey and creamy. You can also not use butter and/or milk.
recipe.ingredients: 1/3 cups milk , butter4 cup shell noodles2cups cheese Wiz
recipe.directions: In a medium pot, fill with 3/4 water; bring to a boil. Add shell noodles. stir often till noodles are fully cooked. Add Milk, butter and cheese Wiz and stir thourghly.

recipe.name: Spicy Italian Beef
recipe.description: A spiced beef which can be served as a main dish, or used as a filling for fajitas or sandwhiches. Note: Peperoncini are 2- 3 inch pickled mild peppers. Best found in Italian or pickled food sections.
recipe.ingredients: 1 boneless beef chuck roast (3 to 4 pounds) 1 jar (12 ounces) peperoncini 1 can (14 1/2 ounces) beef broth 1 bottle (12 ounces) amber ale 1 onion, peeled and minced 2 tablespoons Italian herb blend 1 loaf French Bread, cut into thick slices 10 slices provolone cheese (optional)
recipe.directions:
Slow Cooking Directions: 1. Trim fat from roast. Cut roast, if necessary, to fit in slow cooker, leacing meat in as many large pieces as possible. 2.Drain peppers; pull off stem ends and discard. Add peppers, broth, ale, onion and herb blend to slow cooker. DO NOT STIR. Cover; cook on LOW 8 to 10 hours. 3. Remove meat from slow cooker; pull with 2 forks. Return meat to slow cooker. Mix well. 4. Serve on French bread, topped with cheese if desired. Add additional sauce and peppers as desired.
Makes 8 to 10 servings.

recipe.name: Pasta with Herbs, Lemon and Shrimp Sauce
recipe.description: A flavourful pasta made for all the shrimp lovers out there.
recipe.spices: Hot pepper flakes Basil Oregano Parsley Black Pepper
recipe.ingredients: ? cup (1 stick) butter Grated zest of 1 large lemon 6 large garlic cloves, chopped ? tsp hot pepper flakes 2 tsp dried basil 2 tsp dried oregano 500 grams raw medium shrimp, shelled and deveined ? cup finely chopped fresh parsley 2 whole green onions, finely chopped Salt Lots of freshly ground black pepper ? cup fresh lemon juice ? cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese
recipe.directions: Melt butter in a large, heavy skillet. Add lemon zest, garlic, red pepper flakes, basil and oregano and cook for two minutes. Add shrimp and saut? until opaque, about four minutes. Add parsley, green onions, salt and pepper and cook one minute. Stir in lemon juice and cook another minute, then toss with hot pasta and Parmesan cheese. Serve at once, with extra grated cheese. Recommended pasta: linguini or spaghetti.

recipe.name: Ukrainian Borsh
recipe.description: In Russian and Ukraine cuisines borsch (borshch, borscht) is very popular. It has a lot in common with another popular Russian dish - shchi. The main ingredient of any borsch is a beet. This is why any borsch has very reach taste and bright red color. Real borsch has a little bit sweetish taste. There are many very popular recipes of borsch. As with kasha you can experiment with ingredients and create you own borsch recipe, including vegan or vegetarian recipes. You can try such ingredients as beans, cabbage, carrots, cucumber, potatoes, onions, or tomatoes, mushrooms, and meats (chicken, pork, or beef).
recipe.ingredients: 1 lb beef tenderloin steak 3 carrots (chopped) 3 onions (chopped) 2 big beets 3 medium potatoes 1 small head of cabbage
recipe.directions: 1 - Cook meat for 2 hours in *water* or until meat is very tender -reserve liquid (*add water if needed along the way) 2 - Get meat out of pot and shred-set aside. 3 - Saute' onion, carrots in small skillet-set aside with meat. 4 - Boil beets in meat broth/water until soft. 5 - Take beets out and shred. 6 - Cut up raw potatoes and raw cabbage. 7 - Put all-(the saute'ed mixture--beets, meat, raw ingredients)--together in broth/water. 8 - Boil until potatoes are done (about 30 minutes). 9 - Add spices according to taste. 10 - SERVE WITH SOUR CREAM!

recipe.name: Shrimp Salad Rolls
recipe.description: This is a twist on the normal shrimp or salad appetizer. This Thai wrap similar to an eggroll combines different groups of flavors to create either a light meal or a delicious appetizer. Feel free to experiment with adding your favorite twists to this recipe to make it your own.
recipe.ingredients: 1 pkg(340g) High Liner White Wine and Herb Marinated Shrimp 1 cupeach sweet red perpp and mango thinly sliced 1 cup bean sprouts 1/4 cup each fresh coriander and red onion, thinkly sliced Dash of hot pepper sauce (depending on how spicy you like it) 8 rice papers (21cm diameter works perfectly) 2 cups of packed baby spinach 1/2 cup sweet Thai chili sauce or plum sauce(dip)
recipe.directions: 1. Cook shrimp according to package directions, let cool completely. Remove the tails from the shimp if there are any. Toss shrimp with red pepper, mango, bean sprouts, coriander, onion, oil, ginger, salt and hot pepper sauce until evenly coated. 2. Dip each rice paper wrapper into warm water for 20 seconds or until softened and pliable. Lay flat on clean damp towel. Center 1/4 cup of spinach along hte bottom third of the wrapper leaving 1 inch border. top with 1/2 cup of shrimp mixture. 3. Starting at bottom, roll tightly just until folling is covered. Fold hte sides in and continue to roll tightly until folling is enclosed. Cut in half diagonally, and repeat for each wrapper.

recipe.name: Kabab-e Barg
recipe.description: This is a traditional Iranian food. Almost every single resturant in Iran serves this food since it is very popular.
recipe.spices: Garlic, black pepper, saffron, salt, sumac
recipe.ingredients: (6 servings) fillet of lamb, 1 kg extra-virgin olive oil, 1/2 cup 3 onions, grated 2 cloves of garlic, crushed 6 medium tomatos saffron, 1/2 teaspoon (optional) salt black pepper sumac (optional)
recipe.directions: Prepare marinade: mix olive oil, onions, garlic, saffron, salt and black pepper. Cut lamb into 1 cm thick and 4-5 cm long pieces. Do not remove all the fat as you will need it to melt. Marinate overnight (preferrably 24 hours) in refrigerator. Container should be covered. Thread lamb on long, thin metal skewers. Thread whole tomatoes separately on another skewer. Brush with marinade. Barbeque for about 5-10 minutes on each side, turning frequently. Kabab Barg can also be made in the oven. Prepare as before, pre-heat the grill to a high temperature and place just under the grill, again turning frequently. Serve hot with basmati rice or on middle-eastern bread. If served with rice, some sumac may be sprinkled on.

recipe.name: Hippie Pancakes
recipe.description: This is a recipe for those who are morally conscious. It has all natural and organic ingredients. It should taste a bit saltier than other pancakes.
recipe.ingredients: 1 C. unbleached wheat blend flour 2 tsp. baking powder 1 tsp. unrefined sugar 1/4 tsp. coarse kosher salt 1 free-range egg 1 1/4 C. hormone-free milk 1 tsp. organic vegetable oil
recipe.directions: Pre-heat griddle over medium heat. Combine dry ingredients in a mixing bowl. Stir in egg, milk and oil. Use a large spoon or gravy ladle to transfer pancake batter to the griddle. Pancakes are ready to flip when large bubbles can be seen on top.

recipe.name: Stuffed peppers
recipe.description: This is the easiest meal for everybody, espesially for students because it doesn't need to much ingredients and doesn't need to much time.
recipe.spices: salt, paprika and any spices that you like
recipe.ingredients: 4 green pepper 200 gramm of ground beef onion 200 gramm of cooked rice and spices
recipe.directions: Wash peppers then remove stem ends, seeds, and white membranes. chop onions and mix it with ground beef and with rice and some salt and paprika.fill the peppers with this mix, after stir fry onions for 3 mins and put peppers to that bowl add some water and spices and cook it for 30 min

recipe.name: Spicy Spaghetti
recipe.description: null
recipe.spices: Dried red chili Black pepper cayenne pepper
recipe.ingredients: 2 packages of ground beef 1/2 chopped onion 1 onion, chopped 2 garlic cloves, finely chopped 2 dried red chilies 1 can tomato paste 3 tablespoons black pepper 1 can diced tomatoes 1 package spaghetti
recipe.directions: In a large pot, empty both packages of groud beef. At the same time, fill a medium pot halfway with water; bring it to a boil. When your meat is finished cooking add the tomato paste, diced tomatoes, garlic, chilies, pepper, and onion. Stir together on low heat When water comes to a boil, take one handful of spaghetti for each person eating, break it in half, and add the pasta into the pot slowly, to avoid splashing yourself. Stir the pasta frequently to avoid having the pasta stick together. Cook for 8 minutes. Drain and serve pasta. Top with sauce. Preserve the sauce by covering it with a paper cloth and seran wrap. Makes about 6 servings.

recipe.name: Vegan Banana Spiced Pancakes
recipe.description: A wonderful vegan breakfast from the post punk kitchen. They are very filling, full of delicious banana flavour, and taste great if you add some berries (especially currants).
recipe.ingredients: 1 1/2 cups whole wheat flour 2 tablespoons raw sugar 2 teaspoons baking powder 1/2 teaspoon salt sprinkle of cinnamon sprinkle of allspice 1 1/4 cup vanilla soymilk 3 medium sized ripe bannannas peeled and sliced oil or non-stick cooking spray
recipe.directions: 1. In a bowl combine all the dry ingredients exept bananas. 2. Next in a blender add in half of the bananas and the soymilk and puree until smooth. Pour wet to dry and fold in unprocessed bananas. 3. Heat the griddle with the oil on there over medium heat. Put some of the pancake batter on the griddle and cook until lots of tiny bubbles start to pop. Flip the pancakes over and continue to cook until pancakes are browned. Serve with syrup.

recipe.name: World's Best Banana Bread
recipe.description: This is the best banana bread in the world. If you think you've tasted better, you are wrong.
recipe.ingredients: 3 overripe bananas 1.5 cups sugar 1 egg 1 tsp vanilla 1.5 cups all-purpose flour 0.5 tsp salt 1 tsp baking powder 1 tsp baking soda 2 tbsp butter, melted
recipe.directions: Preheat oven to 350 F. In a large bowl, mash bananas. Add sugar, egg, and vanilla. Mix well. In a separate bowl, whisk together flour, salt, baking powder, and baking soda. Add slowly to banana mixture, mixing as you go. Once it is completely mixed, add melted butter. Bake for 45 minutes in oven, or until toothpick in center comes out clean! Enjoy.

recipe.name: Kristi's Tetrazzini
recipe.description: Great to make the night before, especially good for a potluck contribution
recipe.ingredients: 4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves 1 (12 ounce) package wide egg noodles 2 (10.75 ounce) cans condensed cream of chicken soup 2 fresh broccoli, minced 3 stalks celery, chopped 1 cup fresh sliced mushrooms 1 onion, chopped salt to taste ground black pepper to taste 1 pinch seasoned salt 1/4 cup shredded Cheddar cheese 1/4 cup mozzarella cheese, shredded 1 pinch paprika
recipe.directions: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Coat a 13x9 inch baking dish with cooking spray. In a 3 quart saucepan, boil chicken for about 30 minutes. Drain, and cut into bite sized pieces. Meanwhile, cook pasta according to directions. Drain. In a large bowl, mix together cream of chicken soup, broccoli, celery, sliced mushrooms, seasoned salt, salt, pepper, and onion. Stir in pasta and chicken pieces. Spread mixture into the prepared baking dish. Sprinkle with shredded cheese and paprika. Bake for 45 minutes.

recipe.name: Good Old Meat Pie
recipe.description: great deep dish meat pie made with potatoes, carrots and peas in a rich gravy. Lamb chicken or pork can be used in place of beef. A great recipe for leftover meat!"
recipe.ingredients: 1 recipe pastry for a 9 inch single crust pie 3 tablespoons margarine 1/2 cup chopped onion 1 potato, diced 1/3 cup all-purpose flour 1/2 teaspoon dried oregano 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder 1/4 teaspoon black pepper 1 1/4 cups beef broth 1 carrot, chopped 1 cup frozen green peas 2 cups cubed cooked or leftover beef
recipe.directions: 1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). On a lightly floured surface, roll the pie crust out into a 12 inch circle. Set aside. 2. Melt margarine in a saucepan over medium heat. Add potato and onion, and cook until the onion is tender, but not brown. Sprinkle the flour over the mixture, and stir to blend. Season with oregano, black pepper and garlic powder. Pour in the beef broth, and add the peas, carrot and beef. Bring to a boil. Transfer the mixture to a 2 quart casserole dish, and place the pastry over the top. Cut slits for steam, and flute the edges. 3. Place on a baking sheet, and bake for 25 to 30 minutes, or until crust is golden. Let stand 10 minutes before serving to thicken.

recipe.name: Shawarma
recipe.description: This is a traditional Arabic recipe.Shawarma is thinly sliced cuts of meat, like chicken, beef, goat, lamb, and sometimes turkey, rolled into a large piece of flatbread or pita that has been steamed or heated. Inside the pita, foods like hummus, tahini, pickles, vegetables, and even french fries are added. Think of shawarma as a taco or burrito Middle Eastern style
recipe.spices: Red Chilli Powder Hot Pepper Garlic Powder Turmeric Powder Salt Feelings - Gemini
recipe.ingredients: 5 kg bonelesse chicken, 400 g Lemon juice, 400 g olive oil 150 g rushe garlic 1T Salt, 2 t Pepper, 100 g cordamon powder, 100 g cunin powder, 100 g Coriander powder, 2 T mustard, 1 c White vinegar, 1 ds cloves powder, 1 ds nutmic grined, 1 c plane youghurt.
recipe.directions: Remove the skin from chicken,cut chicken into 1/4 flaten the chicken pieces ,marinatad with all ingredients,keep them in the refrigerator over night (12hours),insert the meat on ashawarma spick on top each other (pc by pe till the chicken are combleted 2. Grilli on a shawarma machine or slice them and grill on top frying grill3. Served as sandwiches or in a plate , served with garlic sauce ,mint leaves and pickels.

recipe.name: Blackened Fish
recipe.description: This recipe calls for trout, but catfish or red snapper would be equally good. Be sure to have a well ventilated kitchen
recipe.ingredients: tablespoon paprika 2 teaspoons dry mustard 1 teaspoon cayenne pepper 1 teaspoon ground cumin 1 teaspoon black pepper 1 teaspoon white pepper 1 teaspoon dried thyme 1 teaspoon salt 3/4 cup unsalted butter, melted 6 (4 ounce) fillets trout 1/4 cup unsalted butter, melted
recipe.directions:
In a small bowl, mix together paprika, dry mustard, cayenne pepper, cumin, black pepper, white pepper, thyme and salt; set aside. Heat a heavy cast iron pan on high heat until extremely hot, about 10 minutes.
Pour 3/4 cup melted butter into a shallow dish. Dip each fillet into butter, turning once to coat both sides. Sprinkle both sides of fillets with spice mixture, and gently pat mixture onto fish.
Place fillets into hot pan without crowding. Carefully pour about 1 teaspoon melted butter over each fillet. Cook until fish has a charred appearance, about 2 minutes. Turn fillets, spoon 1 teaspoon melted butter over each, and cook until charred. Repeat with remaining fish.

recipe.name: World's Best Banana Bread
recipe.description: This is the best banana bread in the world. If you think you've tasted better, you are wrong.
recipe.ingredients: 3 overripe bananas 1.5 cups sugar 1 egg 1 tsp vanilla 1.5 cups all-purpose flour 0.5 tsp salt 1 tsp baking powder 1 tsp baking soda 2 tbsp butter, melted
recipe.directions: Preheat oven to 350 F. In a large bowl, mash bananas. Add sugar, egg, and vanilla. Mix well. In a separate bowl, whisk together flour, salt, baking powder, and baking soda. Add slowly to banana mixture, mixing as you go. Once it is completely mixed, add melted butter. Bake for 45 minutes in oven, or until toothpick in center comes out clean! Enjoy.

recipe.name: Cameron Three Bean Chili
recipe.description: This spicy chili contains no meat, but a lot of protein. It's a great choice for vegetarians.
recipe.ingredients: 2 Tablespoons olive oil 2 medium onions, chopped 1 medium red pepper, chopped 1 medium green pepper, chopped 1 large jalapeno pepper (seeded, de-veined and chopped) 6 cloves garlic, minced 1 cup beer 2 16 oz. cans diced tomatoes 1 14 oz. can black beans 1 16 oz. can dark red kidney beans 1 tablespoon ground cumin 2 tablespoons chili powder 1 tablespoon hot pepper sauce 1 teaspoon salt 1 can vegetarian refried beans with chiles
recipe.directions: In a large pot, add olive oil and warm over medium heat. Add onion, peppers, and garlic. Saute until soft.Add tomatoes, black beans and kidney beans, stirring well to combine. Add cumin, chili powder, hot sauce and salt. Stir in refried beans. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 15 minutes.

recipe.name: Cold Sesame Noodles
recipe.description: This is a traditional Chinese noodle recipe. Lots of Chinese people, specially people from Beijing and northeast part of China like it very much, me as well. The taste is great and can be varies by adding different sauce.
recipe.ingredients: 1 cup mung bean sprouts 12 ounces egg noodles 4 1/2 tablespoons sesame oil, divided 1 cucumber 3 tablespoons red rice, red wine or balsamic vinegar 2 tablespoons soy sauce 2 teaspoons granulated sugar 1 teaspoon hot chili oil 1 cup cooked chicken, shredded 2 tablespoons toasted sesame seeds
recipe.directions: Blanch the mung bean sprouts in boiling water and drain thoroughly. Cook the noodles according to the package directions. Drain the noodles thoroughly and toss with 1 to 1 /2 tablespoons sesame oil. Peel the cucumber, cut in half lengthwise and remove the seeds, and julienne. To prepare the sauce, combine the remaining sesame oil, vinegar, soy sauce, and hot chili oil. Set aside. To serve, place the noodles on a serving plate. Arrange the cooked chicken, cucumber and bean sprouts over top. Pour the sauce over. Sprinkle with the toasted sesame seeds. Serve cold.

recipe.name: Chicken Khurma
recipe.description: This is a traditional North Indian recipe which is a not very hot but a lot of spices are used in it. This particular dish has gravy and goes well with rotis or naans.
recipe.spices: Cloves, Dried Cinnamon Sticks, Bay leaf, Cumin Seeds, Corriander Powder
recipe.ingredients: 1-1.5lb chicken 2 medium Onions 3 big Green Chillies, chopped 1/2 inch Ginger, chopped 1/4 cup Coconut grated 1/2 tsp turmeric powder 1/2 tsp Coriander powder 1/2 tsp Cumin seed powder 1 tsp Saunf Garam masala 1 tsp (cloves - 1, cinnamon stick - 1, bay leaf - 1) Salt to taste 4 tsp Oil 2 tbsp Coriander leaves
recipe.directions: Grind the ginger, saunf and green chillies with half the onions (with little water) and set aside. Grind the grated coconut with some water and set aside. In a pan, heat oil and add the garam masala items and then the rest of the onions. Saute the onions for a while. Then, add the chillies-ginger-onion paste and saute. Then, add the turmeric powder, coriander powder, cumin seed powder and salt. Fry this mixture for a while maybe adding a little bit of water. Then, add the chicken pieces and some water and cover the pan with a lid and allow to cook for 1/2 hr - 1 hour (or until chicken is done). When the chicken is cooked, stir in the coconut paste with some water and bring to a boil. Add the coriander leaves for garnish. Goes well with rice and rotis.

recipe.name: Superbowl Chili
recipe.description: A simple and customizeable slow cooker chili recipe
recipe.ingredients: 2 packages of ground beef 2 packages of hot italian sausage 2 cans of tomato paste 2 to 3 cans of diced tomatoes (any flavour) (drained) 2 cans of kidney beans (drained) 2 cans of chicken broth 3 bell peppers (any colour) 1 jar of hot peppers (drained) 1 bottle of hot sauce 1 package of chili powder
recipe.directions: Cooking Superbowl Chili should be a very personal experience, and it should taste a little different every time you cook it. Keep this in mind when you get started. Since you're going to need it in time for the Superbowl, and since a good chili should be cooked for roughly a day and a half, you'll want to get started early Saturday morning. I'd be more specific with the ingredients, but really it's something you have to get a feel for, and it's largely dependent on the size of your slow cooker. You'll need a slow cooker, and lots of meat. Preferably ground beef, and hot italian sausage. Typically you'll want to grab 2 regular sized packages of ground beef, and 2 packages of hot italian sausages. First you'll want to squeeze all of the meat out of the italian sausage, this part is fun, and sloppy. Collect it with your ground beef and brown them both together (cook it all halfway - don't worry, this meat will cook for a day and a half in the slow cooker later on). While the meat cooks, cover it with any spices you like and dice your bell peppers. When the meat is ready, drop it in your slow cooker and stir in your peppers along with 1 can of everything, half of your hot peppers (don't pour the juice in), and some of your hot sauce and chili powder. Be sure that you have at least 1 inch of clearance between your chili and the ridge of your slow cooker so nothing overflows. Now the fun begins. Set your slow cooker to Low and put the lid on it - remember, this is a slow and steady process. Now go do something else, and let the chili smell take over your house for an hour or two. But keep a lazy eye on it. You'll notice that as the chili cooks, condensation forms on the lid of the slow cooker, and it drips back into the chili, making it watery. This is ok for now. Just keep stirring it every once and awhile and if it gets very watery, leave the lid off and let it cook for about a half hour, this will dry the chili out and give you some room to work with. Just repeat this process until the Superbowl, and don't worry about letting it cook while you sleep. As long as you have a good inch between the edge of the slow cooker and the surface of the chili, you'll be fine, but be sure to leave the lid on while you sleep or else you'll end up with a real messy slow cooker full of crusty chili. When you get to whereever you're going to watch the game, add the rest of your ingredients. This will add layers of flavour to your chili since some will have been cooking for days and some will be real fresh. Then eat up. Enjoy the game. And get a good book in your bathroom cause you'll probably be spending alot of time there for the next couple of days.

recipe.name: Three Bean Salad
recipe.description: Delicious, health easy to make recipe.
recipe.spices: 1 cup white sugar 1 cup vinegar 1/2 cup salad oil 1 1/2 teaspoon salt 1 12 teaspoon pepper
recipe.ingredients: *error in data*
recipe.directions: Put all of the beans into a large bowl and mix well. Mix the beans gently so you don't mush the canned green and yellow beans. Place all dressing ingredients into a jar and shake well or mix together well in a bowl. Pour the dressing over the beans, mix and refrigerate. This is best made the day before to allow the flavors time to meld together

recipe.name: Red rice
recipe.description: This is a traditional African recipe. I found it in an African cooking book. It can be prepared spicy depending on your preference.
recipe.ingredients: 2 c water, 1 3lb chicken cut into pieces, Pcs, 2 16oz cans stewed tomatoes, 2 t Salt, 1/4 t Black pepper, 3/4 c Cooked smoked ham (cubed), 1 c Uncooked Rice, 1 large Onions (sliced), 3 c cabbage (shredded), 1/2 lb Fresh green beans quartered and stems removed OR 1 10oz pk frozen beans, 1/4 t Ground cinnamon, 1/4 t Cayenne pepper.
recipe.directions: 1. Pour water into a large pot. Add the chicken, tomatoes, salt, and pepper. 2. Cover; bring to a boil, reduce the heat, and simmer for 30 minutes. 3. Stir in the ham, rice, onion, cabbage, green beans, cinnamon, and cayenne pepper. 4. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low. Cover and simmer until the chicken is fork-tender and the rice is cooked, 25-30 minutes.

recipe.name: Paneer Tikka on a Vegetable Platter
recipe.description: This is a Indian traditional recipe. I found it from world wide web, and also my mom cooks this all the time. It should taste a spicy and a little bit sweet. You can adjeust the level of spices.
recipe.spices: Red Chilli cumin power Ginger Garlic Paste bell peppers red onions chat masala
recipe.source: Indian Recipe Paneer Tandoori Power Sugar Minced corinader leaves minced mint leaves carrots
recipe.ingredients:
1/2 cup curd (yoghurt) 1 tsp red chilli powder 1 tsp cumin powder 2 tsp tandoori powder 1/2 tsp sugar 2 tsps ginger garlic paste 1 tbspn minced coriander leaves 1/2 tbsp minced mint leaves
3 cups of vegetables( bell peppers, red onions, tomatoes, mushrooms, carrots) 2-3 tsp chat masala
recipe.directions: Mix together all the ingredients for the marinade with some salt and set aside. Cut the veggies into juliennes and add the chat masala and remaining marinade(if any)to them. Brush the marinade on the paneer slices and refrigerate for 2-3 hrs. Heat some butter/oil and fry the paneer on both sides till well done. Alternatively, you can brush each paneer piece with some oil and bake in a 350 deg f oven till done. Heat some oil and stir fry the veggies till they are crisp. Just like the paneer, you can alternatively bake these in an oven till they are done. In a platter, arrange the paneer slices in the middle and place the veggies around it. Garnish with lemon wedges and serve hot.

recipe.name: Alfredo Sauce
recipe.description: This is a Italian recipe. It taste very rich and creamy. It is usually served with feterchini noodles but it can be used with any pasta noodle. If the Parmesan cheese doesn't melt well, you can substitute it with Gruyere cheese.
recipe.source: Italian recipe that i found on the internet at http://allrecipes.com/Recipe/Alfredo-Sauce-2/Detail.aspx
recipe.ingredients: 1/4 cup butter 1 cup heavy cream 1 clove garlic, crushed 1 1/2 cups freshly grated Parmesan cheese 1/4 cup chopped fresh parsley
recipe.directions: Melt butter in a medium saucepan over medium low heat. Add cream and simmer for 5 minutes, then add garlic and cheese and whisk quickly, heating through. Stir in parsley and serve.

recipe.name: Kool-Aid
recipe.description: This is a tasty and thirst-quenching fruit drink that will satisfy your thirsty needs.
recipe.ingredients: 1 cup sugar 1 packet of Kool-Aid 8 cups of water
recipe.directions: Put the 8 cups of water into a large drink tupperware. Slowly pour and stir in the Kool-Aid powder, mixing the colouring and flavouring into the water. After the entire drink is the same colour, slowly stir in the cup of sugar until completely dissolved. Pour and enjoy. Refrigerate.

recipe.name: Easy Tasty Chili
recipe.description: This is a recipe for chili that my mother taught me to make when I was a child. It's simple, quick, and easy to make. And it's tasty!
recipe.ingredients: 1 lb lean ground beef4 cans tomato soup2 cans kidney beans 1 tablespoon onion flakes3 teaspoons chili powder
recipe.directions: In a large pot, add the lean ground beef and sprinkle the onion flakes over top. Cook over medium heat for about 30 minutes until the meat is brown and the fat has boiled off. Then add the 4 cans of soup and 2 cans of kidney beans. Add 3 teaspoons of chili powder, add more or less to taste. Stir until everything's mixed in. Continue heating for another 15 minutes until it starts to boil, then serve. Works great with bread or buns for dipping.

recipe.name: Franks Hot Ham Sandwhich
recipe.description: This is a homemade ham sandwhich reciple I invented. It has a lot of good spice and tons of flavour compared to any regular sandwhich.
recipe.ingredients: 1-2 slices of Ham Franks Red Hot Melted Cheddar/Swiss Cheese Honey Mustard Fresh Whole Wheat Toasted Bread Mayo Tomatoes
recipe.directions: Put bread in toaster, melt cheese and ham on bread in oven with franks red hot on it. Then put the rest of the listed ingredients in between toast and enjoy! Careful its hot!

recipe.name: Banana Chocolate Chip Muffins
recipe.description: None
recipe.ingredients: 1 medium egg. 1 cups of flour. cup of milk. cup of chocolate chips. cup of brown sugar. cup of pur??ed banana. cup of vegetable oil. 3 teaspoons of baking powder. teaspoon of salt. teaspoon of cinnamon. teaspoon of nutmeg.
recipe.directions:
Blend all of the ingredients together thoroughly.
Pour the mixture into greased muffin tins, about two-thirds full.
Bake at 400??F (205??C) for twenty minutes.

recipe.name: Tomatos with fried eggs
recipe.description: A traditional Chinese side dish easy to make and easy to adjust to personal perferrences.Originally meant to be mild, but can be made spicy or sweet and sour.
recipe.ingredients: 2-3 eggs, Scrambled but not cooked yet 2 tomatos, diced half onion, chopped 3 teaspoons vegetable oil 1 teaspoon salt (sugar and/or dry red pepper optional) 1 cup of water (depends on how juicy is the kind of tomato you are using)
recipe.directions: First put oil into the frying pan and heat it up but not boil. Then the tomatos because tomatos takes longer to cook. Put salt ,sugar and/or dry red pepper or other spices into the scranbled eggs while your tomatos are cooking. Once the tomatos become soft and not much water left, push them to the side of the frying pan so the eggs can touch the bottom then put in the eggs. The eggs will be ready in a minate so mix them and it is ready to be served. It gose with anything.

recipe.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipe.description: A delicious recipe for homemade chocolate chip cookies
recipe.ingredients: 3/4 cup sugar, 3/4 cup packed brown sugar, 1 cup butter, softened, 2 large eggs, beaten, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 2 1/4 cups all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 3/4 teaspoon salt, 2 cups semisweet chocolate chips, if desired, 1 cup chopped pecans
recipe.directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Mix sugar, brown sugar, butter, vanilla and eggs in a large bowl by hand. Stir in flour, baking soda, and salt. The dough will be very stiff. Stir in chocolate chips and pecans if desired. Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheet. Bake 8 to 10 minutes or until light brown. The centers will be soft. Let cool completely then remove from cookie sheet.

recipe.name: Quick Tex-Mex Chili
recipe.description: Serve this speedy chili over cooked rice or in tacos. Great for all occasions.
recipe.ingredients: 1 lb extra-lean ground beef (500 g)1 onion, chopped2 cloves garlic, minced1 tbsp chili powder (15 mL)1/2 tsp each dried oregano, paprika and black pepper (2 mL)2 cups mild salsa (500 mL, or one 430-mL jar)1 cup beef stock( 250 mL)1 can (19 oz/540 mL) red kidney beans, drained and rinsed1 can (12 oz/341 mL) whole kernel corn, drained1/4 cup chopped fresh coriander or parsley (50 mL)Salt to taste
recipe.directions: 1.In a large nonstick skillet over mediumhigh heat, combine beef and onion; cook for about 10 minutes, stirring often and breaking up beef with the back of a spoon, until beef is no longer pink. Stir in garlic, chili powder, oregano, paprika and pepper; cook, stirring, for 1-2 minutes.2. Stir in salsa and stock. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium-low; simmer, covered, for 10 minutes, until thickened.3.Add kidney beans and corn; cook, covered, for 5 minutes. Taste and add salt and more pepper if necessary; stir in coriander. Serve with cooked rice or tacos. Serves 4-6

recipe.name: Kool-Aid
recipe.description: This is a tasty and thirst-quenching fruit drink that will satisfy your thirsty needs.
recipe.ingredients: 1 cup sugar 1 packet of Kool-Aid 8 cups of water
recipe.directions: Put the 8 cups of water into a large drink tupperware. Slowly pour and stir in the Kool-Aid powder, mixing the colouring and flavouring into the water. After the entire drink is the same colour, slowly stir in the cup of sugar until completely dissolved. Pour and enjoy. Refrigerate.

recipe.name: Dumpling
recipe.description: Dumplings, pinyin: ShuiJao (Water Dumpling) Typically consist of a ground meat and/or vegetable wrapped into a thinly rolled piece of dough, which is then sealed by pressing the edges together or by crimping. Dumplings are one of the major foods eaten during the Chinese New Year. They can be eaten with soy sauce.
recipe.ingredients: Jiaozi dough: 3 cups all-purpose flour up to 1 1/4 cups cold water 1/4 teaspoon salt Filling: 1 cup ground pork or beef 1 TB soy sauce 1 teaspoon salt 1 TB Chinese rice wine or dry sherry 1/4 teaspoon freshly ground white pepper, or to taste 3 TB sesame oil 1/2 green onion, finely minced 1 1/2 cups finely shredded Napa cabbage 4 tablespoons shredded bamboo shoots 2 slices fresh ginger, finely minced 1 clove garlic, peeled and finely minced
recipe.directions: Stir the salt into the flour. Slowly stir in the cold water, adding as much as is necessary to form a smooth dough. Don't add more water than is ncessary. Knead the dough into a smooth ball. Cover the dough and let it rest for at least 30 minutes. While the dough is resting, prepare the filling ingredients. Add the soy sauce, salt, rice wine and white pepper to the meat, stirring in only one direction. Add the remaining ingredients, stirring in the same direction, and mix well. To make the dumpling dough: knead the dough until it forms a smooth ball. Divide the dough into 60 pieces. Roll each piece out into a circle about 3-inches in diameter. Place a small portion (about 1 level tablespoon) of the filling into the middle of each wrapper. Wet the edges of the dumpling with water. Fold the dough over the filling into a half moon shape and pinch the edges to seal. Continue with the remainder of the dumplings. To cook, bring a large pot of water to a boil. Add half the dumplings, giving them a gentle stir so they don't stick together. Bring the water to a boil, and add 1/2 cup of cold water. Cover and repeat. When the dumplings come to a boil for a third time, they are ready. Drain and remove. If desired, they can be pan-fried at this point.

recipe.name: Easy simple chili
recipe.description: This is a simple easy chili to make, very thick.
recipe.spices: chili seasoning mix packet, or your own special mix, i won't give away mine.
recipe.ingredients: 1/2 cup chopped onion 1 tablespoon vegetable oil 1 1/2 pounds ground beef 1 envolope chili seasoning mix 1 can diced tomatoes, drained 1 can kidney beans, drained 1 tablespoon brown sugar 1/2 diced green pepper
recipe.directions: Heat oil in a large, heavy skillet. Cook ground beef and onions over medium heat until it is no longer pink. Stir in chili seasoning mix, then add remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 10 minutes. Serve with cornbread or crackers. Serves 6.

recipe.name: Pilaf
recipe.description: This is a middle eastern main course, consisting of broiled rice
recipe.ingredients: 3 cups of whole grain rice 6 cups of water 2 medium sized carrots Can of chicken broth 1 onion, chopped half a garlic clover 2 teaspoons of olive oil 1 teaspoon salt
recipe.directions: In a large pot, combine the 3 cups of rice and 6 cups of water. Add a teaspoon of salt. Cook until rice becomes partially soft. Prep the can of broth wih half of a garlic clove into the pot. Add the chopped onions in, and stir. Then cut the two carrots into smaller pieces, and throw them into the pot - continue to stir. Carefully pour the contents of the pot into another heated pot ( on a low setting). Cover the pot, and let it simmer.

recipe.name: Terrific Turkey Chilli
recipe.description: Using some fresh and some canned ingredients, this chili is a snap to throw together and will keep you craving it for days. If you like beans in your chili, garbanzos right out of the can are great in this.
recipe.spices: Taco Seasoning, Ground Coriander, Dried Oregano, Chilli Pepper Flakes
recipe.ingredients: 3 tablespoons vegetable oil, divided 1 1/2 pounds ground turkey 1 (1 ounce) package taco seasoning mix 1 teaspoon ground coriander 1 teaspoon dried oregano 1 teaspoon chili pepper flakes 2 tablespoons tomato paste 1 (14.5 ounce) can beef broth 1 (7 ounce) can salsa 1 (14.5 ounce) can crushed tomatoes, or coarsely chopped tomatoes packed in puree 1 (7 ounce) can chopped green chile peppers 1 medium onion, finely chopped 1 green bell pepper, diced 3 medium zucchini, halved lengthwise and sliced 1 bunch green onions, chopped 1 cup sour cream 1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese
recipe.directions: Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large stock pot over medium-high heat. Crumble turkey into the pot, stirring with a wooden spoon to break apart as much as possible. Season with taco seasoning mix, coriander, oregano, chili flakes, and tomato paste, and mix until meat is evenly coated with seasonings. Continue cooking, reducing heat if necessary, until turkey is well browned. Pour in beef broth, and simmer to reduce liquid slightly, about 5 minutes. Add salsa, tomatoes, and green chilies, and continue cooking at a moderate simmer for ten minutes. Adjust the thickness at any time you feel necessary by adding water. While chili is still cooking, heat one tablespoon of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook onion and green bell pepper, stirring occasionally for 5 minutes, or until onion is translucent and bell pepper is lightly browned. Add onion and bell pepper to the chili, and continue cooking at a very low simmer. In the same skillet, heat the remaining tablespoon of oil over medium-high heat. Add the zucchini, and cook stirring occasionally, for 5 minutes, or until lightly browned. Add the zucchini to the chili, reduce heat, and continue cooking 15 minutes more. Again, adjust the consistency with water as needed. Ladle chili into serving bowls. Top with sour cream, green onion, and cheddar cheese, and serve.

recipe.name: Russian Borscht
recipe.description: null
recipe.spices: Green bell pepper, dried dill weed, dround black pepper
recipe.ingredients: 6 cups water 3/4 teblespoon salt 1/2 cup finely chopped carrots 1/4 cup chopped green bell pepper, divided 1/2 stalk celery, chopped 1 medium beet 1/2 cup canned peeled and diced tomatoes 3 potatoes, quartered 1/3 cup butter 1/2 cup chopped onion 1 1/2 cups canned tomatoes 3 cups finely shredded cabbage, divided 1/4 cup heavy cream 3/4 cup diced potatoes 1 tablespoon dried dill weed 1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper to taste salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
recipe.directions: Place water, salt, carrots, 1/2 of the bell pepper, celery, beet, tomatoes, and quartered potatoes in a large stock pot over high heat. Bring to a boil. Melt 1/3 cup butter in a separate skillet over medium heat. Saute onions in butter until tender, approximately 5 minutes. Stir in tomatoes, reduce heat to medium low, and simmer for 15 minutes. Remove 1/2 cup of sauce from skillet, and set aside. Stir half of the cabbage into the skillet with remaining sauce, and continue simmering 5 minutes more, or until tender. Remove beet from boiling liquid and discard. Remove potatoes with a slotted spoon or tongs, and place in a bowl with remaining 1 tablespoon of butter and the cream. Mash together until smooth. Return the 1/2 cup of reserved onion-tomato sauce to the stock pot. Stir in diced potatoes, and simmer until just tender but still firm, approximately 5 minutes. Increase heat to a low boil, and stir in remaining cabbage, tomato sauce, and mashed potatoes. Reduce heat and simmer a few minutes more. Stir in remaining bell pepper, season with black pepper, and serve.

recipe.name: Balsamic Veal Escalopes
recipe.description: This is a easy to make everyday recipe. I found it on Reader's Digest
recipe.ingredients: 1lb(500g) cherry tomatoes 1 tbsp (15ml) olive oil 4 veal escalopes 2oz (60g) butter 2 tbsp (25ml) balsamic vinegar 2 tbsp(25ml) snipped fresh chives
recipe.directions: Preheat oven to 350F(180C). Toss tomatoes in oil then place in a roasting pan and bake for 12-15minutes Meanwhile, lay out veal pieces between two sheets of plastic wrap. Using a meat mallet or heavyrolling pin, pound veal to flatten it Heat butter in frying pan until it starts to foam, add veal for 2 minutes on each side, or until tender. Remove from the pan and set aside in a warm place Pour balsamic vinegar into the pan with buttery juices. Stir, then bring to boil. Cook sauve over a high heat for 5minutes, or until sauce has reduced by half. Return veal to the pan briefly to reheat, then sprinkle with chives before serving with cherry tomatoes

recipe.name: Spicy Chicken Curry
recipe.description: A family favourite spicy chicken curry recipe passed down to my mother.
recipe.ingredients: 2 chili peppers 2 onions 3 cloves of garlic 1 tbsp of grated ginger 2 fresh tomatoes (chopped) Chicken (breasts, thights, legs) Fresh coriander leaves, chopped (as much as you like) 1 tbsp garam marsala 1 tbsp cumin powder 1 tbsp coriander powder 1 tbsp of tumeric powder 1/2 tsp hot chili powder Cubed potatoes (optional) Broccoli flowrets (optional) 1 can of coconut milk (add a second if more needed)
recipe.directions: In a large pot add 3 tbsp of vegetable oil. Add chili peppers, onions, garlic, ginger and saute until onion is transparent. Add garam marsala, cumin, coriander, tumeric and hot chili powder. Add chopped tomatoes, chicken, and coriander and toss chicken until completely coated. Add potatoes and coconut milk. Stir well and cook covered at medium-low until potatoes and chicken and cooked. At this point you can add broccoli if desired and cook covered for a few minutes longer. NOTE: Do not let coconut milk boil as it will curdle. Makes 6 servings.

recipe.name: Spice-Rubbed Pork Chops
recipe.description: Big, meaty chops pair well with full-flavored ingredients. This lime and chili powder marinade is just the ticket. Add more or less of the hot pepper sauce to suit your taste.
recipe.ingredients:
4 boneless pork lion chops, cut 1/2 inch thick
1/4 cup lime juice
2 tablespoons chili powder
1 tablespoon olive oil
1 and 1/2 teaspoons ground cumin
1 and 1/2 teaspoons ground cinnamon
1/2 teaspoon bottled hot pepper sauce
1/2 teaspoon salt
1 clove garlic, minced
recipe.directions: Trim fat from chops. Place chops in a plastic bag set in a shallow dish. For the marinade, in a small bowl stir together the lime juice, chili powder, olive oil, cumin, cinnamon, hot pepper sauce, salt, and garlic. Pour over chops; seal bag. Marinate in the refrigerator for 4 to 24 hours, turning bag occasionally. Drain chops, discarding marinade. Preheat broiler. Place chops on the unheated rack of a broiler pan. Broil 3 to 4 inhces from the heat for 6 to 8 minutes or until done (160 degrees Fahrenheit) and juices run clear, turning once halfway through broiling. Makes 4 servings.

recipe.name: Spicy Quesadillas
recipe.description: This is an easy to make recipe that can be altered according to available ingredients and preferences
recipe.ingredients: 4 Thin Pitas Cheddar or Mozzarella cheese One Green Pepper One Red Pepper One Tomato One Large Onion One Jalapeno Olive Oil Ham, Chicken, or Sausage
recipe.directions: Dice up the Green Pepper, Red Pepper, Tomato, and Onion. The meat can be cut into small or large pieces. Grate as much cheese as you would like inside the quesadilla and mix it with the vegetables. Spread the vegetables and cheese over one of the pitas. Add the meat on top of it. Place another top of this. Fry the pita on both sides until the cheese is melted in a pan with olive oil.

recipe.name: Lemon Herb Chicken
recipe.description: This is a simple, quick and delicious dish. All you need are a few spices and, of course, the chicken! The amount of spices are completely up to you. You can add more or less according to your taste. Enjoy!"
recipe.ingredients: 2 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves 1 lemon salt and pepper to taste 1 tablespoon olive oil 1 pinch dried oregano 2 sprigs fresh parsley, for garnish
recipe.directions: Cut lemon in half, and squeeze juice from 1/2 lemon on chicken. Season with salt to taste. Let sit while you heat oil in a small skillet over medium low heat. When oil is hot, put chicken in skillet. As you saute chicken, add juice from other 1/2 lemon, pepper to taste, and oregano. Saute for 5 to 10 minutes each side, or until juices run clear. Serve with parsley for garnish.

recipe.name: Homestyle Curry Chicken
recipe.description: Diced chiken cooked with onions in a thick curry sauce. My family started making this as an imitation of an Indian dish we ate at a restaurant in North Bethesda (suburbs of Washington D.C.). Over time it evolved and became a dish of its own.
recipe.spices: curry powder onion powder garlic powder thyme leaves (dried)
recipe.source: Family recipe based on dish in Indian restaurant.
recipe.ingredients: 2 chicken breasts, ketchup, all the spices listed in the spices section.
recipe.directions: Dice chicken breast into pieces approximately 3x3x2cm (this is not very important, just make the pieces sensible). Slice an onion into half circles. Warm a tad of oil up on a pan (medium-high heat). When onions become glossy, add the chicken. Stir occasionally until chicken is completely white and doesn't show through any raw meat. Add some ketchup, curry, and all the other spices. (Use your good judgement. The sauce should be fairly thick, and have a golden orange color.) Cook for 15 more minutes. Serve with rice.

recipe.name: Chocolate Lushus
recipe.description: A family dessert recipe with a chocolate crust and a pudding like under layer.
recipe.ingredients: 1 cup flour, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 2 teaspoon baking powder, 3/4 cup white suger, 6 tablespoon cocoa powder, 2 tablespoon oil, 1 teaspoon vanilla, 1/2 cup milk, 1/2 cup chopped walnuts, 1 packed cup brown sugar, 2 cup hot water
recipe.directions: In a medium bowl sift together the flour, salt, baking powder, white suger and 2 tablespoon cocoa powder. Add the oil, vanilla, milk, walnuts and blend well. After well blended poor into a 8"x8"x2" pan. In the same bowl add the brown sugar, hot water and 4 tablespoons of cocoa powder. Mix well and pour over batter. Bake at 350' for 45 min.

recipe.name: Lamb and Okra Stew
recipe.description: Old Middle Eastern family recipe, one of my favorites. A mildly spiced lamb stew is served over rice pilaf in this homey main dish
recipe.spices: cumin, fresh mint, dried turmeric, fresh rosemary
recipe.ingredients: 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil 1/4 cup crushed garlic 2 pounds cubed leg of lamb meat 1 teaspoon ground cumin 1 teaspoon chopped fresh mint 1 teaspoon ground dried turmeric 1 teaspoon chopped fresh rosemary 2 (14.5 ounce) cans diced tomatoes, drained 2 tablespoons tomato paste 1 pound baby okra 1 teaspoon lemon juice 1 cup water 1 tablespoon butter 1 cup thin egg noodles 2 cups long grain rice 2 cups chicken broth 2 cups water 1 pinch salt and pepper to taste 1 teaspoon olive oil
recipe.directions: 1. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the garlic, and cook until transparent. Add the cubed lamb, and cook until browned on all sides. Season with cumin, mint, turmeric and rosemary. Cook for another 5 minutes. Add the diced tomatoes, tomato paste and okra. Combine the lemon juice and water, and stir into the skillet. Cover, and simmer over low heat for 45 minutes. 2. Meanwhile, melt the butter in a saucepan over medium heat. Add the egg noodles, and saute until toasted. Pour in the chicken broth and water, and bring to a boil. Stir in rice, cover and simmer over low heat until the rice is tender, about 15 minutes. Season with salt and pepper and stir in olive oil before serving. Serve the lamb stew over the rice pilaf.

recipe.name: Meat with potato
recipe.description: Generally speaking, it is potatoe cooked in the frying pan. It's half cooked and half fried. :)
recipe.ingredients: 1 lb cut beef, 1 onion, 10 potatoes, 2 carrots
recipe.directions: Firstly, we start cooking beef pieces until they are ready, then we put onion and carrot pieces to the pan. Then wait till the onion will get golden color, add some ragu sauce and mix them all. We will get orange stuff. Finally we put potatoes into the pan, add some salt, and mixe everything. Put on the cover and wait about 15 mins for it to be cooked. There is not much to do, but believe me this is my favourite cooking recipe;

recipe.name: All Dressed Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipe.description: Traditional chocolate chip cookies with a bit of a twist. Experiment with other flavours of chips!
recipe.source: Average recipe book with some creativity
recipe.ingredients: 1/4 cup sugar 1 cup of semi-sweet chocolate chips 1/2 cup brown sugar, firmly packed 1/2 cup shortening 1 teaspoon vanilla 1 egg, well beaten 1 cup sifted flour 1/2 teaspoon baking soda 1/2 teaspoon salt 1 cup of smashed All Dressed Chips
recipe.directions: Mix sugars, shortening, and vanilla together. Add egg and beat mixture. Sift dry ingredients together and add to mixture. Stir in 1 cup of semi-sweet chocolate chips. Mix in 1 cup of smashed All Dressed chips. Drop onto ungreased baking sheet. Bake at 375F for 8-10 minutes.

recipe.name: Chocolate Lushus
recipe.description: A family dessert recipe with a chocolate crust and a pudding like under layer.
recipe.ingredients: 1 cup flour, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 2 teaspoon baking powder, 3/4 cup white suger, 6 tablespoon cocoa powder, 2 tablespoon oil, 1 teaspoon vanilla, 1/2 cup milk, 1/2 cup chopped walnuts, 1 packed cup brown sugar, 2 cup hot water
recipe.directions: In a medium bowl sift together the flour, salt, baking powder, white suger and 2 tablespoon cocoa powder. Add the oil, vanilla, milk, walnuts and blend well. After well blended poor into a 8"x8"x2" pan. In the same bowl add the brown sugar, hot water and 4 tablespoons of cocoa powder. Mix well and pour over batter. Bake at 350' for 45 min.

recipe.name: Tuna Casarole
recipe.description: My Father's Best Recipe
recipe.ingredients: 1 Can Cream Of Mushroom Soup 1/2 Cup Milk 1 Can Tuna 1 Cup Peas 1 1/4 Cup Crushed Potato Chips
recipe.directions: Blend Milk and Soup; Stir in Tuna, Peas and Chips. Bake in 350-375 degree Fahrenheit oven for 25 minutes Serves 3 or 4

recipe.name: Milk Pancakes
recipe.description: Basic but delicious milk pancakes
recipe.ingredients: 1 cup flour 1 tsp white sugar 1 tsp baking powder 1/2 tsp salt 1 1/2 cup milk
recipe.directions: Mix all together and fry in very hot pan

recipe.name: 7 Layer Dinner
recipe.description: Large Dinner, feeds 4
recipe.ingredients: See Directions
recipe.directions: Into a 9" casserole dish, put 1" of raw potatoes, sliced thin, a layer of sliced onions, a layer of sliced carrots. Sprinkle on 1/4 c. minute rice, 1 tin of peas and juice, a layer of pork sausage. Pour over all 1 tin tomatoe soup which has been dilluted with 1 tin water. Bake in moderate oven for about 2 hours. Bake with lid on for first hour.

recipe.name: Raisin Spiced Muffins
recipe.description: Delicious muffins Makes 24 small muffins or 14 large ones
recipe.ingredients: 1/4 c. shortening 3/4 c. white sugar 1 beaten egg 1/2 c. of water from the boiled raisins 1 c. raisins 1 1/2 c. flour 1 tsp baking soda 1/2 tsp cloves 1/2 tsp cinnamon 1/2 tsp salt
recipe.directions: Wash 1 c. raisins + boil them in a cup or so of water until you have about 1/2 cup of water left. Sift the shortening, white sugar, egg, water and raisins. Add flour, baking soda, cloves, cinnamon and salt. Grease muffin tins + brown until delicately brown. Bake at 350 degree Fahrenheit for 20 min.
